SUMMARY:
ADVERTISEMENTStruggling against an orgy of shouting, clapping, and singing, the solemn weight of history dissolves in the deep shadows of the Gol Gumbaz.
This flux characterises Bijapur, a palimpsest notable for the legacies of the monumental Adil Shahs.
From the Baran Kaman to the Taj Bauri, from Ibrahim Rauza to Gagan Mahal, the past speaks in Bijapur.
In almost a century since, as the Palmyra lies devastated, the built legacy of Bijapur is at risk of an oblivion given the splintering of civic belonging and urban development.
It is ours, a shared task: it is a challenge to make the past one with the future.
TEXT:
ADVERTISEMENT

Struggling against an orgy of shouting, clapping, and singing, the solemn weight of history dissolves in the deep shadows of the Gol Gumbaz. A royal tomb, the Gumbaz is sublimely grave in a way only maqbaras can be. Yet, after half a millennium it is also the sanctuary of a motley public. Despite its sepia magnificence, it is reinvented daily and is many things and places simultaneously.

And why not? Buildings, after all, do have a life of their own. They breathe and suffer, and are reborn with the communities who live in and around them. They change with the people who come to them as much, perhaps, as people are changed by their experiences of them. This infusion of character is constant and dynamic, and so the original creative intent becomes one amongst an unending matrix of meanings which emerge from brick and mortar.

This flux characterises Bijapur, a palimpsest notable for the legacies of the monumental Adil Shahs. The long shadows of memory and the tangible history of built form make the boundaries of past and present sfumato with constant use. From the Baran Kaman to the Taj Bauri, from Ibrahim Rauza to Gagan Mahal, the past speaks in Bijapur. It whispers of ambition, the seductions of power strange and terrible, desire and aspiration immortalised in stone. Born of vanity and vision, it symbolises a fusion of form, time, and space not only in terms of what was but also of what can be.

How do we imagine ‚Äî spatially, economically, and affectively ‚Äî the contours of such a fusion though? Who belongs to a city, and to whom do its edifices, not just its monuments but also buildings and infrastructure, belong? The law shelters the business of conservation from the commerce and traffic of daily life. Our conservation apparatus seems designed to institute alienation, and rarely does a neighbourhood, community, or people claim trusteeship over a building. We care about our homes, the houses we live in, but find it difficult to think of our cities as home, to care for the songs and shadows they surround us with.

The personal, therefore, is exiled from the communal, and the voice of memory and affect is unable to find a niche under the arch of history. In turning deaf to these voices, in seeing our past not as vibrantly alive but as delicately dead, we perform a grave disservice to our future. The Jami Masjid in Bijapur, for example, belongs both to the community of worshipers, as to the conservation apparatus which serves to memorialise it as a beacon of dakhini architecture. These meanings are not necessarily contrary, but that they often can be is a story local not just to Bijapur but to scores of cities across the subcontinent.

What is needed, then, is a marriage of interpretations and practice. Writing in 1889, Henry Cousens, then Superintendent of the Archaeological Survey of India (Western Circle), related that 'Bijapur has been called the Palmyra of the Dekhan'. In almost a century since, as the Palmyra lies devastated, the built legacy of Bijapur is at risk of an oblivion given the splintering of civic belonging and urban development. The manifold significance of the past is often in its ability to overwhelm, to instil a reverential awe which prompts interrogation and introspection. As we cloister these works and stories of our ancestors behind higher walls and turn blindly towards the future, we risk becoming harsher, meaner, and poorer.

Our heritage belongs to all of us. We cannot privilege one meaning and practice, without irrevocably losing the layered richness which grounds us organically to our communities and cities. The processes of use and interpretation have to be contextual, and it is through constant conversation alone that this erosion can be checked. How, for instance, do we make Taj Bauri relevant to the potable needs of residents without losing sight of the public generosity which informed its making? How do we reinvent Gol Gumbaz as a rendezvous point for a citizenry starved of safe public spaces? Can Baran Kaman become the breathing emblem of ambition which soars, and fails, and yet lives? The challenge at hand is to birth a future which sustains as much from the past as it loops back to it, where growth will aspire to be not from but with a common legacy. This challenge is monumental in itself, for it is not specific to Bijapur. It is ours, a shared task: it is a challenge to make the past one with the future.

Anubhav Pradhan is an Urban Research Fellow with the Indian Institute for Human Settlements. The views expressed here are his own.
TITLE: Notes From Bijapur: Why Its Architectural Legacy Is At The Risk Of Oblivion

SUMMARY:
Here are some of the things I do to impress the importance of Remembrance Day upon my children.
Not just on Remembrance Day, but other times, too ‚Äî as opportunities arise.
I will go to the Remembrance Day assembly at their school when I can.
We won't be putting up Christmas decorations until after Remembrance Day out of respect for veterans.
I will tell my kids that they might see me cry on Remembrance Day.
TEXT:
We are fast approaching one of the most important days of the year. A day to remember and reflect. A day to appreciate the men and women who currently serve to protect our beautiful country. And a day to remember those in the past who went off to war on our behalf, many of whom made the ultimate sacrifice. A sacrifice meant to keep Canada strong and free. A sacrifice paid for with blood and tears.

But how can I explain this to my school-age children? How can I impress upon them the importance of this very special day? I'll admit it's a heavy task. Here are some of the things I do to impress the importance of Remembrance Day upon my children.

1. I talk to them about it throughout the year.

Not just on Remembrance Day, but other times, too ‚Äî as opportunities arise. This kind of discussion tends to be very short, simple and matter of fact with younger children, but as they get older I can really start to share some hard truths with them. Truths like the fact that in many different wars over the years, men and women went off to war for Canada. They left their moms, dads, wives, husbands and, in some cases, kids to trudge off to war. They left the comfort of their home for the cold, wet trenches and left the calm of Canada for the constant fear of war elsewhere.

These people were likely afraid. Very afraid. They were likely cold and hungry sometimes. They endured seeing friends die right next to them. They went to sleep each night not knowing if it would be their last. And they did all of this for us. For you and me and all of our fellow Canadians. And we should be grateful. Not just on Nov. 11 each year, but every day.

2. I make it personal (where possible).

If there is any relative or friend who fought for our country, I will tell my kids about them. I tell them about how my grandfather went to serve in the Second World War, leaving his wife and young son at home. He ended up training other soldiers and thankfully came home again. I also tell them about how my grandmother's brother was killed overseas during the Second World War. He was never returned to his family.

This is what sacrifice looks like, children. Real sacrifice.

I talk with my children about this family member who was lost in war to help them realize that the sacrifice is not abstract. It is not other families. Their very own great grandma, who they knew well, lost her younger brother to one of these wars. She and her family likely sent him off as a hero with fanfare and love, and then later got a letter saying he was killed in action. Killed overseas, a long way from home. This is what sacrifice looks like, children. Real sacrifice.

3. I will go to the Remembrance Day assembly at their school when I can.

When I am able to see what they are learning at school, then I can use our conversations at home to reinforce and even sometimes expand on what they've learned. I make sure we are at some ceremony every year. There are so few soldiers left from the World Wars. We need to honour these veterans while we can and learn from them. We need to hear the stories they share and keep their stories alive.

4. I will take them with me to buy poppies.

And we will buy new poppies every year. I used to wonder why poppies were so easy to lose and one year I even worked on figuring out a way to keep mine for the following year. Now I'm thinking why on earth would I do that? Buying new poppies every year is one of the ways that veterans collect donations and I am more than glad to buy them for my family each year. It's the very least I can do.

5. I will tell them why we fight wars.

I try to explain to my kids that Canada might be a very different place if our soldiers had not joined forces with other countries to fight against evil. I talk about why wars, though awful, are sometimes necessary. Our country might not have remained a place where people could feel safe holding true to their culture, religion and beliefs. This country could possibly be under totally different rule today. It took our soldiers, fighting alongside the soldiers of other brave countries, to enable us to continue to be the "true north strong and free." And I am grateful.

6. I will respect this time of year.

We won't be putting up Christmas decorations until after Remembrance Day out of respect for veterans. I explain this to my children so they know why we wait.

Thank a veteran today and let's be so grateful for all they've done for our great country.

7. I will tell them that war is still a reality.

I will be sure to let my children know that there are soldiers from Canada who are in the line of fire today. They are on peace keeping missions or are in war torn areas and they are in danger. They are risking their lives even now on behalf of our country.

8. I will tell my kids that they might see me cry on Remembrance Day.

When I am at a ceremony and the enormity of what's been done for us falls upon me, then sometimes there are tears. Embarrassing for you, my kids? Possibly. But I will never be sorry or ashamed for any single one of those tears. The soldiers who fought gave up so much more than tears. They gave their lives. Their last breath, their life's blood. Their families gave more tears than enough. The least I can do is cry.

Never forget, my children, that the peace and freedom we have in Canada, we owe to those who came before us. Those who bravely fought to make sure that no one could take it from us. Thank a veteran today and let's be so grateful for all they've done for our great country.

Lest we forget.

Follow HuffPost Canada Blogs on Facebook

Also on HuffPost:
TITLE: Never Forget, My Children, The Importance Of Remembrance Day

SUMMARY:
South Africa's first international skateboarding gold-medalist and Guinness World Record skateboarder, Jean-Marc Johannes, has won yet another medal, this time at the FISE World Series.
Johannes went head-to-head with China's Qun Xiang Gao and Sun Sunkunkun to win a silver medal at the competition.
This was his second international medal, and it makes him South Africa's only skater to step on to an international podium.
Johannes successfully completed the biggest stunt of his career as part of the Red Heart Crew, when he crossed Cape Town's Liesbeek River with three back-to-back tricks.
He is one of three South African skateboarders qualified to compete on the international circuit, where he skates among the top 50 skaters in Europe.
TEXT:
South Africa's first international skateboarding gold-medalist and Guinness World Record skateboarder, Jean-Marc Johannes, has won yet another medal, this time at the FISE World Series.

Johannes went head-to-head with China's Qun Xiang Gao and Sun Sunkunkun to win a silver medal at the competition.

"This was undoubtedly the highest level of finals I've ever competed under, because in almost every other event I can tell where I stand in the finals," he said in a statement.

This was his second international medal, and it makes him South Africa's only skater to step on to an international podium.

"I'm proud to have represented South Africa as the only African competitor; contests such as FISE give me the priceless opportunity to compete with the best skateboarders in the world, and [it] undoubtedly puts my mind in the right place, with the Olympics around the corner," the statement added.

The skateboarder's love for the sport started at the age of 11, and he has since received several accolades ‚Äì‚Äì such as debuting as the first South African on skateboarder Tony Hawk's channel.

Johannes successfully completed the biggest stunt of his career as part of the Red Heart Crew, when he crossed Cape Town's Liesbeek River with three back-to-back tricks.

He is one of three South African skateboarders qualified to compete on the international circuit, where he skates among the top 50 skaters in Europe.

He also has a heart of gold, and runs an initiative called "Fill the Gap", which provides motivational speeches and demos at schools internationally and locally.
TITLE: Jean-Marc Johannes Knows Just How To Skate To Success

SUMMARY:
Jennifer Lawrence may have just conducted Kim Kardashian's most revealing interview yet.
Lawrence played guest host on "Jimmy Kimmel Live" last week and interviewed the reality icon ‚Äï one of her own personal icons ‚Äï on a range of hard-hitting issues: namely farting in front of husband Kanye West and the phallic shape of her KKW Beauty makeup brushes.
After presenting a flesh-colored contour brush from the collection to the audience, Lawrence, implying that the brush looked more like a sex toy than a cosmetics tool, admitted to Kardashian the brush was "not at all what she thought it was for."
"It wasn't necessarily the flesh color that made me think it was a dildo," Lawrence laughed.
TEXT:
Jennifer Lawrence may have just conducted Kim Kardashian's most revealing interview yet.

Lawrence played guest host on "Jimmy Kimmel Live" last week and interviewed the reality icon ‚Äï one of her own personal icons ‚Äï on a range of hard-hitting issues: namely farting in front of husband Kanye West and the phallic shape of her KKW Beauty makeup brushes.

After presenting a flesh-colored contour brush from the collection to the audience, Lawrence, implying that the brush looked more like a sex toy than a cosmetics tool, admitted to Kardashian the brush was "not at all what she thought it was for."

"It wasn't necessarily the flesh color that made me think it was a dildo," Lawrence laughed.
TITLE: Here's Why Kim Kardashian Didn't Realize Her Makeup Brushes Look Like Dildos

SUMMARY:
National treasures Kate Winslet and Allison Janney shared a kiss onstage at the Hollywood Film Awards on Sunday night, and we‚Äôre honestly all the better for it.
‚ÄúAllison, I know I don‚Äôt really know you, I just want to be you,‚Äù she continued.
Maybe?‚ÄùAs the audience laughed, Janney took her cue and made her way to the stage to take the actress up on her offer.
‚ÄúAh, it‚Äôs gonna happen!‚Äù Winslet said.
‚ÄúThis is an exciting moment, isn‚Äôt it!‚ÄùThat‚Äôs when the two shared a quick kiss and hug on stage, fangirling over each other for a brief moment before Winslet got back to the task at hand.
TEXT:
Someone cast these two in a road trip movie immediately.

National treasures Kate Winslet and Allison Janney shared a kiss onstage at the Hollywood Film Awards on Sunday night, and we‚Äôre honestly all the better for it.

Winslet got the ball rolling when she accepted the Hollywood Actress Award for her performance in ‚ÄúWonder Wheel.‚Äù During her speech, she naturally expressed her undying love for Janney, who was also honored that evening for her work in the upcoming biopic ‚ÄúI, Tonya.‚Äù

Kevin Winter via Getty Images

‚ÄúAllison Janney is in this room,‚Äù a very sincere Winslet told the audience.

‚ÄúAllison, I know I don‚Äôt really know you, I just want to be you,‚Äù she continued. ‚ÄúI want to stroke you, or something. I mean, we could always kiss, maybe? Maybe?‚Äù

As the audience laughed, Janney took her cue and made her way to the stage to take the actress up on her offer.

‚ÄúAh, it‚Äôs gonna happen!‚Äù Winslet said. ‚ÄúThis is an exciting moment, isn‚Äôt it!‚Äù

That‚Äôs when the two shared a quick kiss and hug on stage, fangirling over each other for a brief moment before Winslet got back to the task at hand.

Watch the moment in all its glory below.
TITLE: Today's Joy Is Brought To You By Kate Winslet Kissing Allison Janney

TEXT:
PARADISE PAPERS - Les r√©v√©lations men√©es dans le cadre de l'enqu√™te des Paradise Papers se poursuivent ce mercredi 8 novembre: cette fois, c'est le r√©alisateur fran√ßais Jean-Jacques Annaud qui est cit√©, accus√© d'avoir dissimul√© 1,2 million d'euros (1,48 million de dollars) au fisc fran√ßais.

Selon les informations d√©voil√©es dans les Paradise Papers, tout aurait commenc√© en 1997, alors que le r√©alisateur achevait le tournage de son film "Sept ans au Tibet". Dix jours avant la sortie dans les salles am√©ricaines, Jean-Jacques Annaud cr√©e un "trust" baptis√© "Los Condores Trust" et bas√© sur l'√Æle de Guernesey. Au sein de ce trust, une soci√©t√© √©cran: Uspallata Limited.

C'est sur le compte de "Los Condores Trust" qu'a √©t√© vers√©e la r√©mun√©ration de Jean-Jacques Annaud pour "Sept ans au Tibet". "Non pas √† l'initiative de M. Annaud, mais √† l'initiative du studio de cin√©ma", ont pr√©cis√© les avocats du r√©alisateur.

De l'Europe √† Hong Kong, en passant par les √Æles Ca√Ømans

Par la suite cependant, le montage fiscal prend une dimension internationale dont la chronologie correspond, comme le souligne Le Monde, aux diff√©rentes r√©v√©lations sur les scandales off-shores qui ont secou√© le monde de la finance ces derni√®res ann√©es.

En 2003, la soci√©t√© d'Uspallata est transf√©r√©e de l'√Æle de Guernesey vers les √Æles Vierges Britanniques, tandis que son si√®ge social est lui d√©plac√© aux Bahamas. "Los Condores Trust" prend lui d√®s juillet 2007 la direction des √Æles Ca√Ømans, o√π il sera g√©r√© par la firme Appleby, au c≈ìur des r√©v√©lations des Paradise Papers.

Le trust sera cependant ferm√© d√®s 2015, tout comme la soci√©t√© Uspallata, dissoute l'ann√©e suivante. Qu'advient-il de l'argent? 1,33 million de dollars est transf√©r√© vers une nouvelle soci√©t√© "Rising Dragon" (qui deviendra par la suite Ginkgo Holdings Limited) cr√©√© fin 2014 √† Hong-Kong. Quant au reste de la somme, il est envoy√© √† une soci√©t√© californienne d√©tenue par Jean-Jacques Annaud, et elle-m√™me succursale d'une autre soci√©t√© install√©e dans l'√©tat du Delaware, connu pour sa r√©glementation fiscale avantageuse.

Contact√© par Le Monde et RadioFrance avant la publication des Paradise Papers, Jean-Jacques Annaud a demand√© √† ses avocats de r√©gulariser sa situation. Comme le pr√©cise le quotidien, les avoirs "auraient finalement √©t√© d√©clar√©s au fisc fran√ßais le 12 octobre", "afin d'√©viter toute discussion et d'√™tre dans la plus totale transparence".

TITLE: Jean-Jacques Annaud √©pingl√© √† son tour dans les Paradise Papers

SUMMARY:
Democrat Ralph Northam defeated Republican Ed Gillespie in Virginia‚Äôs gubernatorial election Tuesday, granting Democrats their first major victory, and Republicans their first big loss, since the election of President Donald Trump.
The outcome provides rank-and-file Democrats with a much-needed injection of optimism, averting the catastrophic scenario of another crucial loss.
‚ÄúThey‚Äôre breathing a sigh of relief.‚ÄùWhat‚Äôs more, the significant size of Northam‚Äôs win bodes well for Democrats across the country in the 2018 midterm elections, according to Kidd.
Northam, 58, a pediatric neurologist and the current lieutenant governor, ran a mainstream Democratic campaign that emphasized his all-American biography.
More than any one policy outcome, however, Northam‚Äôs win delights progressives for what it denies the GOP: another vindication of Trump-like race baiting.
TEXT:
Democrat Ralph Northam defeated Republican Ed Gillespie in Virginia‚Äôs gubernatorial election Tuesday, granting Democrats their first major victory, and Republicans their first big loss, since the election of President Donald Trump.

Northam beat Gillespie by a comfortable margin of 54 to 45 percent.

The stakes of the closely fought race were especially high for Democrats, who were desperate to hold on to a governorship in a state with a popular Democratic governor and where Hillary Clinton defeated Trump by 5 percentage points in 2016.

The outcome provides rank-and-file Democrats with a much-needed injection of optimism, averting the catastrophic scenario of another crucial loss.

It also deals a blow to the Trump-like right-wing populist playbook that Gillespie employed in his bid to win.

‚ÄúDemocrats were anxious all along, at the very end, about whether this thing would go their way, whether their core vote would turn out for them. And it did,‚Äù said Quentin Kidd, a political science professor at Christopher Newport University in Newport News, Virginia. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre breathing a sigh of relief.‚Äù

What‚Äôs more, the significant size of Northam‚Äôs win bodes well for Democrats across the country in the 2018 midterm elections, according to Kidd.

‚ÄúEverything we thought was happening was actually happening,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThere was a lot of pent up anger and frustration in the Democratic electorate.‚Äù

Win McNamee/Getty Images Democrat Ralph Northam defeated Republican Ed Gillespie in the nation's closest watched election on Tuesday.

Northam had held a modest advantage in an average of major polls on Election Day. But the wide variation in individual polls toward the end of the contest spooked many Democrats who had anticipated a more certain victory.

Northam, 58, a pediatric neurologist and the current lieutenant governor, ran a mainstream Democratic campaign that emphasized his all-American biography. Northam is a graduate of the Virginia Military Institute who served as an Army doctor during Operation Desert Storm before establishing a practice in southeast Virginia‚Äôs Hampton Roads region.

Northam campaigned on continuing the work of Gov. Terry McAuliffe (D), who has presided over sustained economic growth and restored the voting rights of 168,000 former felons.

Northam also proposed increasing public school funding, providing tuition-free community college education in key areas of study for students who pledge a year of service, and using Affordable Care Act funds to expand Medicaid.

Northam will have the important opportunity to play a role the next time the state legislature redraws congressional and state districts in 2021. As governor, he will have the power to veto a plan submitted by the Republican legislature if he believes the makeup of the new districts is unduly partisan.

More than any one policy outcome, however, Northam‚Äôs win delights progressives for what it denies the GOP: another vindication of Trump-like race baiting.

Gillespie, 56, a former chairman of the Republican National Committee and a Beltway lobbyist, once embodied the socially moderate, fiscally conservative establishment wing of the Republican Party. And to some extent, Gillespie maintained this profile, emphasizing economic policy on the stump, including a proposal to cut Virginia‚Äôs income tax rates by 10 percent across the board.

But in a bid to shore up a wayward right-wing base that nearly handed populist Corey Stewart the nomination in a tough GOP primary, Gillespie embraced the Trump playbook.

In a barrage of negative advertisements, Gillespie sought to paint Northam as a frightening radical who would enable convicted sex offenders, undocumented immigrants and members of the El Salvadoran gang MS-13 to run amok in the Old Dominion State. He also claimed that Northam wanted to take down the state‚Äôs Confederate monuments, despite Northam‚Äôs assurances that he would allow localities to decide.

Ultimately, Gillespie‚Äôs approach scared off too many of the voters he needed to win in the increasingly Democratic-leaning state.
TITLE: Virginia Democrat Wins Race For Governor, Handing GOP First Major Loss Under Trump

SUMMARY:
Lebensjahr macht der Amerikaner Hossein Golabchi, kurz als "Soudy" bekannt, Jagd auf teils stark bedrohte Tiere.
Auf dem Bild ist erkennbar, dass dem Tier offenbar mindestens zwei Mal in seine Hinterbeine geschossen wurde, bevor es letztlich seinen Verletzungen erlag.
Die Jagd auf die bedrohte Wildkatzenart ist allerdings weltweit illegal.
Illegaler Handel auf dem SchwarzmarktLeider ist der Schneeleopard unter sogenannten Wilddieben ein beliebtes Ziel, mit dem illegale H√§ndler auf dem Schwarzmarkt viel Geld verdienen.
Um ein Zeichen gegen die Jagd des bedrohten Tieres zu setzen, startete die Umweltschutzorganisation TERA eine Petition gegen Golabchi.
TEXT:
Seit seinem 16. Lebensjahr macht Hossein "Soudy" Golabchi Jagd auf teils bedrohte Tiere

Das Bild, wie er stolz mit einem erlegten Schneeleoparden posiert, sorgt gerade f√ºr viel Aufregung

Bereits √ºber 100.000 Menschen unterschrieben nun eine Petition um den Amerikaner hinter Gitter zu bringen

Unter Wilderern gilt er als eine Legende: Seit seinem 16. Lebensjahr macht der Amerikaner Hossein Golabchi, kurz als "Soudy" bekannt, Jagd auf teils stark bedrohte Tiere.

Ein Foto, das im Jahr 2008 entstanden sein soll und nun ver√∂ffentlicht wurde, sorgt gerade f√ºr besonders viel Emp√∂rung unter Tiersch√ºtzern. Denn auf dem Bild ist der aus dem Iran stammende Troph√§enj√§ger zu sehen, wie er stolz mit einem toten Schneeleoparden √ºber seinen Schultern posiert.

Auf dem Bild ist erkennbar, dass dem Tier offenbar mindestens zwei Mal in seine Hinterbeine geschossen wurde, bevor es letztlich seinen Verletzungen erlag. Das Tier soll er vor neun Jahren auf einer Jagd in Zentralasien erlegt haben. Die Jagd auf die bedrohte Wildkatzenart ist allerdings weltweit illegal. Trotzdem berichtete der Sch√ºtze schon 2008 stolz √ºber das Erlegen des Raubtieres in seinem Buch ‚ÄúObsessed!‚Äù.

Illegaler Handel auf dem Schwarzmarkt

Leider ist der Schneeleopard unter sogenannten Wilddieben ein beliebtes Ziel, mit dem illegale H√§ndler auf dem Schwarzmarkt viel Geld verdienen. Um ein Zeichen gegen die Jagd des bedrohten Tieres zu setzen, startete die Umweltschutzorganisation TERA eine Petition gegen Golabchi. Bis jetzt fand sie bereits Unterst√ºtzung von √ºber 100.000 Menschen.

Die Tierschutzaktivistin Amanda W. schreib dazu:

‚ÄúWir m√ºssen bei diesem langj√§hrigen und au√üerordentlich aktiven Troph√§enj√§ger seltener Raubkatzen ein Exempel statuieren, sonst werden diese wundervollen Tiere f√ºr immer verschwinden. Ich habe diese Petition am Internationalen Tag des Schneeleoparden 2017 gestartet. Lasst uns alle zusammen arbeiten, damit dieser Mann bis zum Schneeleoparden-Tag 2018 zur Rechenschaft gezogen wird.‚Äù

√úber 400 wilde Tiere

Wie viele Tiere Soudy in seiner Karriere insgesamt erlegt hat, ist unklar.

Allerdings stellt er laut "Superslam", einem Wettbewerb unter Wildj√§gern, die ihn 2003 mit einem Award ehrten, allein in seinem eigenen Museum 400 wilde Tiere 225 verschiedener Spezien aus.

TERA sieht den Troph√§enj√§ger als ein Symbol der Wilddieberei, die mit ihren Errungenschaften Geld im Darknet verdienen. Daher ist ihr Ziel ihn als Beispiel vieler ins Gef√§ngnis zu bringen. Obwohl das Erlegen des Wildtieres bereits vor einigen Jahren stattgefunden hat, w√ºrden F√§lle der Wilddieberei nicht verj√§hren.

Obwohl sich Hossein Golabchi auf Anfrage vieler Medien zu dem Fall bisher nicht ge√§u√üert hat, gab TERA nun bekannt, dass er laut eigenen Angaben die √úberreste des Leopards erst nach Deutschland gebracht und daraufhin nach Mexiko verschifft habe. Eine genaue detaillierte Stellungnahme werde momentan erwartet.

Vor dem Aussterben bedroht

Seit 1972 gilt der Schneeleopard als eine vor dem Aussterben bedrohte Tierart. Laut dem Naturschutzbund NABU gibt es in ganz Asien nur noch rund 4.000 frei lebende Schneeleoparden. Allein in Kirgistan sank die Zahl der Wildkatzen in 30 Jahren von 1.400 auf nur noch rund 300 Exemplare.

Wenn ihr auch etwas gegen die illegale Jagd auf die Tiere unternehmen wollt, k√∂nnt ihr hier die Petition von PERA gegen Hossein Golabchi unterschreiben oder euch hier bei Tierschutzorganisationen wie NABU oder WWF √ºber weitere M√∂glichkeiten der Unterst√ºtzung informieren.

(mf)
TITLE: Dieser Mann prahlt damit, bedrohte Tiere zu t√∂ten - so k√∂nnt ihr ihn stoppen

SUMMARY:
Abbiamo in mano la ricetta, ci rechiamo diligentemente in farmacia, prendiamo il nostro farmaco e seguiamo le indicazioni, ma non sempre.
Invece circa la met√† dei pazienti a un certo punto smette di assumere il farmaco, oppure si aggiusta la dose o ancora salta alcune assunzioni.
Gli specialisti la chiamano "aderenza" alle terapie e in tutte le branche mediche il fenomeno √® sempre lo stesso, pi√π della met√† degli ammalati perde motivazione.
Il fenomeno noto come "patient engagement" ossia coinvolgimento del paziente passa attraverso una modalit√† di scambio di informazioni che sia al livello delle capacit√† di comprensione del soggetto.
Il dato emerge in particolare per i pazienti oncologici: nell'85% dei 27 studi pubblicati a partire dal 2000 la maggior parte dei pazienti desiderava essere coinvolto nelle decisioni terapeutiche.
TEXT:
A tutti sar√† capitato di andare dal medico per un disturbo pi√π o meno grave e ricevere una prescrizione. Abbiamo in mano la ricetta, ci rechiamo diligentemente in farmacia, prendiamo il nostro farmaco e seguiamo le indicazioni, ma non sempre. L'obiettivo √® quello di stare meglio e guarire no?

Invece circa la met√† dei pazienti a un certo punto smette di assumere il farmaco, oppure si aggiusta la dose o ancora salta alcune assunzioni. Gli specialisti la chiamano "aderenza" alle terapie e in tutte le branche mediche il fenomeno √® sempre lo stesso, pi√π della met√† degli ammalati perde motivazione. Talora perch√© l'assunzione √® dolorosa o complicata (le terapie iniettive hanno una aderenza pi√π bassa di quelle per bocca, le cure croniche sono soggette a dimenticanze cos√¨ come quando i farmaci da assumere sono pi√π di uno), altre volte insorgono effetti collaterali spiacevoli per esempio il bruciore di stomaco. I fattori sono numerosi.

Nonostante siano state messe a punto varie strategie sembra che della compliance non si riescano a spostare i numeri che di pochissimi punti percentuali mentre aumentano i costi correlati: chi non assume adeguatamente le terapie infatti tende a guarire meno in fretta, a non guarire affatto, ad avere ricadute, ospedalizzazioni sino alla mortalit√† precoce. Un bel problema.

Succede per√≤ che alle volte a problemi complessi basti applicare soluzioni semplici: almeno √® quello che sostiene Cameron Smyres dell'Universit√† della California che insieme ad un gruppo di collega dei reparti di emergenza e pronto soccorso ha esaminato 1268 pazienti nell'arco di 18 mesi scoprendo che quando i medici si soffermavano a spiegare l'azione del farmaco prescritto e la sua importanza nel caso specifico l'adesione alle cure migliorava significativamente. Un risultato cos√¨ rilevante da guadagnarsi una presentazione alla riunione annuale dell'American College of Emergency Medicine.

Rispetto a quelli che ricevevano la prescrizione senza spiegazioni aggiuntive, i pazienti informati erano propensi in misura doppia a seguire le indicazioni mediche e tra coloro che consideravano il medicamento 'molto importante' l'adesione era del 95%, contro il 55% di quelli che non percepivano la prescrizione come tale. La soluzione √® quindi abbastanza semplice, purch√® siano addestrati medici e infermieri che abbiano il tempo necessario a motivare la propria scelta terapeutica e magari a rispondere a qualche domanda del paziente, incoraggiata se necessario, al momento della dimissione.

Il fenomeno noto come "patient engagement" ossia coinvolgimento del paziente passa attraverso una modalit√† di scambio di informazioni che sia al livello delle capacit√† di comprensione del soggetto. Secondo uno studio del 2013 sulla rivista "Health Affairs", i pazienti che sono stati incoraggiati a rivedere le opzioni e sono stati pi√π coinvolti nelle scelte hanno costi medici pi√π bassi del 5,3% a cui si √® aggiunto un 12,5% in meno di ricoveri ospedalieri e un minor numero di interventi di chirurgia elettiva.

Una revisione sistematica riporta che nel 63% degli studi inclusi la maggior parte dei pazienti esprimeva il desiderio di partecipare attivamente alle decisioni terapeutiche che li riguardavano, con un trend in progressivo aumento: dal 50% al 73% degli studi pubblicati prima e dopo il 2000 (3). Il dato emerge in particolare per i pazienti oncologici: nell'85% dei 27 studi pubblicati a partire dal 2000 la maggior parte dei pazienti desiderava essere coinvolto nelle decisioni terapeutiche.
TITLE: Dottore, non ho preso le medicine. Problema per il 50% dei pazienti

SUMMARY:
Raphael ist zwei Jahre alt und leidet an einer besonders aggressiven Form des Blutkrebses, der sogenannten akuten lymphatischen Leuk√§mie (ALL).
Seit gut einer Woche ist die Familie jetzt an der Westk√ºste der USA, um sich auf die Therapie vorzubereiten.
Zwar gab es Hoffnungsschimmer wie die Knochenmarkspende von seiner Mutter, die die Erkrankung vermeintlich bek√§mpfen konnte.
Denn in Deutschland ist die Behandlung derzeit weder zugelassen, noch k√∂nnen Kinder im Rahmen von klinischen Studien behandelt werden.
Die Familie und die √Ñrzte aber sind voller Hoffnung: Raphael soll leben.
TEXT:
Der zweij√§hrige Raphael leidet an einer aggressiven Art von Leuk√§mie

Die einzige Behandlung, die ihn noch retten k√∂nnte, ist in Deutschland nicht zugelassen

Deshalb ist die Familie jetzt extra nach Seattle geflogen - und hofft auf eure Hilfe

Margit und Andreas Fischer haben nicht eine Sekunde gez√∂gert, als sie sich in der Haunerschen Kinderklinik in M√ºnchen entscheiden mussten, ob ihr Sohn leben oder sterben soll. Raphael ist zwei Jahre alt und leidet an einer besonders aggressiven Form des Blutkrebses, der sogenannten akuten lymphatischen Leuk√§mie (ALL).

Weil die Behandlungen in Deutschland nicht mehr anschlugen und es dadurch nur noch wenig Hoffnungen f√ºr den Jungen gab, empfahlen die √Ñrzte eine letzte Alternative: eine neuartige dreimonatige Immunbehandlung an der Westk√ºste in Amerika.

F√ºr die Eltern gab es keine Diskussionen. Ihr Sohn soll leben. Seit gut einer Woche ist die Familie jetzt an der Westk√ºste der USA, um sich auf die Therapie vorzubereiten.

Raphael hat schon f√ºnf Monate Chemo-Therapie hinter sich

Raphaels Leiden begann bereits, als er f√ºnf Monate alt war. Nachdem eine Bronchitis bei ihm diagnostiziert worden war und wochenlang nicht verging, veranlasste der Kinderarzt eine Blutuntersuchung. Dabei machte er die schockierende Diagnose:

Raphael leidet an akuter lymphatischer Leuk√§mie. Eine schmerzvolle und belastende Zeit begann f√ºr die Familie, die noch bis heute anh√§lt.

‚û® Mehr zum Thema: Meine Tochter hatte Krebs - jetzt k√§mpft sie f√ºr andere Kinder

Der kleine Raphael musste einen f√ºnfmonatigen Chemoblock, zwei Antik√∂rperbehandlungen sowie zwei Knochenmarktransplantationen √ºber sich ergehen lassen.

Zwar gab es Hoffnungsschimmer wie die Knochenmarkspende von seiner Mutter, die die Erkrankung vermeintlich bek√§mpfen konnte. Doch am Ende zeigte sich der Krebs widerspenstig. Die b√∂sen Zellen waren wieder da.

Das soll sich jetzt im etwa 8500 Kilometer von Aschau entfernten Seattle √§ndern. Die Behandlung, die er jetzt bekommen soll, kann gef√§hrliche Nebenwirkungen aufweisen. Doch in √§hnlichen F√§llen war sie bereits erfolgreich und f√ºhrte zur Heilung.

Erst k√ºrzlich wurde die Immuntherapie in den USA zugelassen. Laut Fachmedien zeigten klinische Studien, dass sie bei mehr als 80 Prozent der Patienten angeschlagen habe. F√ºr Raphael ist diese Therapie die letzte Chance, den Blutkrebs endg√ºltig zu besiegen.

Die Reise in die USA war f√ºr die Familie eine zus√§tzliche gro√üe Last. Doch sie war n√∂tig. Denn in Deutschland ist die Behandlung derzeit weder zugelassen, noch k√∂nnen Kinder im Rahmen von klinischen Studien behandelt werden.

Margit und Andreas Fischer wollen erreichen, dass nicht nur Raphael, sondern auch andere Kinder mit Leuk√§mie in Deutschland eine solche Chance bekommen.

Kinder wie Raphael sollten auch hier behandelt werden

Deshalb haben sie sich mit der gemeinn√ºtzigen Stiftung "Care for Rare" in Verbindung gesetzt und rufen zu Spenden auf. Die Stiftung setzt sich daf√ºr ein, dass Kinder mit seltenen Erkrankungen nicht leiden oder gar sterben sollten.

Denn gerade weil ihre Erkrankung so selten ist, sollten sie noch mehr Aufmerksamkeit bekommen. Die Familie will eine Plattform f√ºr neue Immuntherapien am Haunerschen Kinderspital errichten, damit in Zukunft Kinder wie Raphael zur Behandlung nicht mehr in die USA geschickt werden m√ºssen.

In Seattle beginnt bald Raphaels Therapie. Er musste wieder eine Chemotherapie √ºber sich ergehen lassen, um die Krebszellen vor dem Therapiestart einzud√§mmen und ist daher etwas schwach. Die Familie und die √Ñrzte aber sind voller Hoffnung: Raphael soll leben.

‚û® Mehr zum Thema: Dreij√§hrige braucht dringend Behandlung: Eine Geldspende kann Kira das Leben retten

Wenn ihr Rafael helfen wollt, k√∂nnt ihr eure Spenden an folgendes Konto √ºberweisen:



Care-for-Rare Foundation (www.care-for-rare.org)

Stichwort ‚ÄûImmuntherapie‚Äú

IBAN: DE93 6305 0000 0000 0035 33

SWIFT-BIC: SOLADES1ULM

(ame)
TITLE: Dieser kleine Junge aus Bayern k√∂nnte sterben - jeder Einzelne von euch kann ihm helfen

SUMMARY:
L'intervista a Matteo Renzi a diMarted√¨, programma condotto da Giovanni Floris, fa ottenere a La7 un picco di ascolti: il programma ha registrato il 9.14% di share, con 2.123.033 spettatori.
Addirittura triplicata la concorrenza di Bianca Berlinguer che con il suo Cartabianca su Rai3 ha ottenuto il 3.17% di share con 747.755 spettatori.
Originariamente su La7 sarebbe dovuto andare in onda il confronto tv con il candidato premier M5S Luigi Di Maio, che ha poi deciso di annullare l'appuntamento.
A commentare con soddisfazione gli ascolti di La7 √® anche il deputato del Partito democratico Michele Anzaldi, segretario della commissione di Vigilanza Rai.
"Con Matteo Renzi la trasmissione DiMarted√¨ su La7 raggiunge il record storico [...].
TEXT:
L'intervista a Matteo Renzi a diMarted√¨, programma condotto da Giovanni Floris, fa ottenere a La7 un picco di ascolti: il programma ha registrato il 9.14% di share, con 2.123.033 spettatori. Addirittura triplicata la concorrenza di Bianca Berlinguer che con il suo Cartabianca su Rai3 ha ottenuto il 3.17% di share con 747.755 spettatori. Originariamente su La7 sarebbe dovuto andare in onda il confronto tv con il candidato premier M5S Luigi Di Maio, che ha poi deciso di annullare l'appuntamento.

"Di Maio? Come il compagno di scuola che ti d√† l'appuntamento ma poi non si presenta"

L'ex segretario, alle prese con il suo tour ferroviario, si √® detto "contento per il record di ascolti a diMarted√¨". A corredo di una foto pubblicata su Instagram, ha scritto: "Spero un giorno di poter parlare di pi√π di misure concrete. Di ci√≤ che abbiamo fatto in questi anni: dopo di noi, terzo settore, omicidio stradale, posti di lavoro, cooperazione, diritti, Expo, infrastrutture. Ma soprattutto di ci√≤ che vogliamo fare: sostegno alle famiglie, abbassamento delle tasse, investimenti per la crescita e lotta alla povert√†. Mettiamo da parte le polemiche della politica politicante: l'Italia merita di meglio per il proprio futuro. Andiamo avanti, #avanti insieme".

A commentare con soddisfazione gli ascolti di La7 √® anche il deputato del Partito democratico Michele Anzaldi, segretario della commissione di Vigilanza Rai. "Con Matteo Renzi la trasmissione DiMarted√¨ su La7 raggiunge il record storico [...]. Il talk di Floris su La7 non era mai arrivato a un livello cos√¨ alto di telespettatori, in questi anni di concorrenza con Raitre. Nella fascia di prime time (20.30-22.30) La7 √® terza rete in assoluto, battuta solo dalle ammiraglie Rai1 e Canale 5: supera tutte le altre reti. Battuto anche l'innovativo show di Mika su Raidue, una delle pi√π pregiate scommesse dei palinsesti Rai. Triplicati gli ascolti di Cartabianca su Raitre", esulta il dem su Facebook.
TITLE: Renzi traina La7 oltre il 9%. La sua intervista a diMarted√¨ triplica gli ascolti di Rai3

SUMMARY:
One of the memes Ludlam has posted in recent times, joking about his role in the citizenship saga.
His case kicked off this entire citizenship circus currently turning Federal Parliament into a national laughing stock, but former Greens senator Scott Ludlam said he has been enjoying watching the controversy unfold as he posts hilarious memes from the sidelines.
Ludlam, a Greens senator for Western Australia, resigned from parliament in July after discovering he held New Zealand citizenship.
Two days later, his Greens colleague in Queensland, Larissa Waters, also resigned after realising her Canadian citizenship.
Ludlam said he had felt "a mix of bewilderment, regret and increasing amounts of schadenfreude" in watching the dual citizenship drama unfold.
TEXT:
One of the memes Ludlam has posted in recent times, joking about his role in the citizenship saga.

His case kicked off this entire citizenship circus currently turning Federal Parliament into a national laughing stock, but former Greens senator Scott Ludlam said he has been enjoying watching the controversy unfold as he posts hilarious memes from the sidelines.

"I loved that job and the people I was working with, so it was a wrench to have it suddenly gone. On the other hand, I've had plenty of time to savour the slow and richly deserved disintegration of the Government, so that's something," Ludlam told HuffPost Australia.

Ludlam, a Greens senator for Western Australia, resigned from parliament in July after discovering he held New Zealand citizenship. This breached section 44 of the constitution, and meant he was ineligible for election. Two days later, his Greens colleague in Queensland, Larissa Waters, also resigned after realising her Canadian citizenship.

Since then, more than a dozen federal MPs have had questions raised about their potential dual citizenship, and four other politicians -- Malcolm Roberts, Fiona Nash, Barnaby Joyce and Stephen Parry -- have been forced to leave parliament after their own citizenship status was revealed.

Ludlam has kept a low public profile since he revealed his citizenship dramas and immediately resigned from the parliament, in contrast to Roberts, Nash and Joyce who resisted calls to resign and instead waited for a High Court judgement.

The former WA senator has been active on Twitter, though, shooting out a number of memes and barely concealing his thoughts on the ever-growing controversy.

On Monday, after Liberal MP John Alexander became the latest member to become embroiled in the section 44 mess, Ludlam tweeted the 'disaster girl' meme of a young child in front of a burning house. The meme is often used to denote someone enjoying the situation they have created -- as Know Your Meme explains, the image of the girl is often "superimposed on to images of natural disasters and accidents to imply that she has caused some type of calamity depicted in the background".

Ludlam said he had felt "a mix of bewilderment, regret and increasing amounts of schadenfreude" in watching the dual citizenship drama unfold. He said, since resigning from parliament, he had split his time between "a lot of handover and transitional stuff, reading, thinking, writing, and occasional undisciplined shitposting."

Just days after he resigned from the Senate, he tweeted a GIF of falling dominoes, a seemingly prescient post considering the number of politicians who have fallen in his wake.

He has also posted a number of jokes since, jokingly taking credit for bringing the often-ignored section 44 to light.

enjoying the government's more measured response to the cascading citizenship debacle pic.twitter.com/MIiKoZiAYL ‚Äî Scott Ludlam üåà (@Scottludlam) August 15, 2017

He even dropped a gag in response to another Twitter user asking "have you just come close to bringing down the Government".

"Trust [in Government] was already in short supply before this latest shambles. This hasn't helped matters, and I know I carry a measure of responsibility for that. The Government could have cauterised this mess by agreeing to an immediate audit, which is surely where this needs to end up," Ludlam said.

"There's more to come, it seems. Now it's playing into internal fault lines within the Coalition, which is deeply destabilising for the country and also means Kevin Andrews' head is on television a lot more."

The former senator has not outlined any plans to return to politics, unlike Waters who has signalled she would like to remain in the arena, and is still weighing up his options.

For now, shitposting seems to keep him happy.
TITLE: Scott Ludlam Is Having Lots Of Fun With The Citizenship Crisis

PHILIPPE HUGUEN via Getty Images

ALLOCATIONS FAMILIALES - D√©tourner un syst√®me de d√©tection de fraude peut avoir du bon. Selon Europe1, c'est d'ailleurs ce que la Caisse d'Allocations Familiales s'appr√™te √† faire pour d√©tecter non pas les fraudeurs, mais les particuliers √©ligibles √† des allocations et qui ne les ont pas demand√©es.

Pour identifier les fraudes, l'organisme de prestations sociales utilise la technique du "data-mining", qui permet d'√©tablir des "profils types" de fraudeurs gr√¢ce √† des calculs math√©matiques. Cette m√©thode a d√©j√† fait ses preuves, puisqu'en 2016, la CAF a d√©tect√© 8% de fraudes en plus, sans que le nombre de fraudeurs augmente pour autant.

Mais c'est dans un autre but que le proc√©d√© devrait bient√¥t √™tre appliqu√© √† l'√©chelle nationale. Apr√®s une premi√®re exp√©rimentation en Gironde ces derniers mois, les chiffres sont √©loquents: sur plusieurs centaines de familles prises comme √©chantillon, 12% d'entre elles ne font pas valoir la totalit√© de leurs droits, notamment lorsque cela concerne le RSA ou la prime d'activit√©.

Or, depuis le lancement du test dans le d√©partement, la CAF estime que les familles √©ligibles et qui ont par la suite fait la demande ont re√ßu en moyenne 210 euros par mois.

Un proc√©d√© √† double tranchant

Fi√®re de ses r√©sultats, la Caisse d'Allocation Familiale envisage donc d'√©largir le proc√©d√© √† la France enti√®re.

"√áa a du sens de montrer qu'aujourd'hui, avec les techniques de 'big data', on peut aller plus loin dans l'application des principes de solidarit√© et d'√©galit√© aux droits", explique Daniel Lenoir, directeur g√©n√©ral de la Caisse nationale des allocations familiales, √† Europe1.

Toutefois, en septembre 2017, le d√©fenseur des Droits Jacques Toubon mettait en garde contre les d√©rives √©ventuelles du "data mining". "La rationalisation des contr√¥les, pr√©f√©r√©e aux actions de pr√©vention, peut parfois rev√™tir un caract√®re discriminatoire", indiquait-il alors dans son rapport, en plaidant pour la prise en compte du droit √† l'erreur ou √† l'oubli, et pour une meilleure information des demandeurs de prestations sociales.

TEXT:
R√âSEAUX SOCIAUX - Les utilisateurs vont pouvoir s'en donner √† coeur joie et poster des messages en 280 caract√®res sur Twitter, le r√©seau social ayant enfin d√©cid√© d'autoriser des tweets deux fois plus longs, plus de 10 ans apr√®s sa cr√©ation.

"Nous allongeons la limite du nombre de caract√®res ! Nous voulons que ce soit plus facile et plus rapide pour tout le monde de s'exprimer", a tweet√© le groupe sur son compte mardi. De son c√¥t√©, son patron-fondateur Jack Dorsey a tweet√© plus sobrement "140+140!".

"Notre but √©tait de rendre (l'allongement) possible tout en s'assurant que l'on conservait la vitesse et la bri√®vet√© qui font de Twitter, Twitter. En regardant les r√©sultats (du test), nous sommes ravis d'annoncer que nous avons atteint notre but et que nous lan√ßons le changement dans toutes les langues" o√π la limite des 140 caract√®res posait probl√®me aux utilisateurs, a √©crit sur son blog le r√©seau social, qui avait lanc√© un test aupr√®s de certains utilisateurs en septembre.

"Les premiers jours du test, beaucoup de gens ont tweet√© en 280 caract√®res parce que c'√©tait nouveau mais rapidement, cela s'est normalis√©", d√©taille le groupe. "Nous avons observ√© que lorsque les gens avaient besoin de plus de 140 caract√®res, ils tweetaient plus facilement et plus souvent", poursuit le groupe, qui tente de se relancer alors qu'il perd toujours de l'argent.

Seuls 7% des tweets en fran√ßais atteignent 140 caract√®res

Paradoxalement, l'entreprise se r√©jouit aussi du fait que les utilisateurs test ont n√©anmoins continu√© √† poster majoritairement des messages en moins de 140 caract√®res, pr√©servant ainsi "la bri√®vet√©" de Twitter, qui le distingue, par exemple, de Facebook.

Twitter s'attend donc √† ce que la nouvelle limite soit finalement peu utilis√©e par les twittos. L'allongement ne concerne que les messages en caract√®res latins, rappelle le r√©seau, car c'est surtout en anglais, espagnol, portugais ou fran√ßais que la limite de 140 caract√®res semble poser parfois souci aux utilisateurs, contrairement √† ceux qui √©crivent en japonais, cor√©en ou chinois, langues plus compactes.

9% des tweets en anglais et 7% en fran√ßais atteignent 140 caract√®res, des proportions qui tombent √† environ 1% avec le passage √† 280, assure aussi le groupe bas√© √† San Francisco, dans l'ouest des Etats-Unis.

Twitter estime que la limite √† 140 caract√®res fait perdre du temps √† l'utilisateur, qui doit modifier ou couper son message, au risque de se d√©courager et de ne pas tweeter du tout. Comme lors de l'annonce du test en septembre, l'annonce de Twitter a suscit√© une avalanche de r√©actions sur le r√©seau, beaucoup d'utilisateurs s'amusant √† tester la nouvelle longueur.

Tr√®s actif sur le r√©seau social, o√π il poste des messages plusieurs fois par jour, Donald Trump utilise la plateforme pour des annonces majeures de politique int√©rieure et internationale, mais aussi pour critiquer des alli√©s, railler des adversaires et menacer la Cor√©e du Nord.

TITLE: Les 280 caract√®res sur Twitter sont maintenant disponibles pour tous les utilisateurs

TEXT:
Le suicide du Gaulois de Portneuf

Nicolas Mesly, reporter et photographe

Hugo Jolion-David, journaliste vid√©o



¬´ C‚Äôest un drame, parce que c‚Äôest d‚Äôabord la perte d‚Äôune vie humaine. Et puis c‚Äôest une entreprise agricole de moins sur notre territoire ¬ª, r√©sume Jean Poirier, maire de Saint-Basile, un village d‚Äôenviron 2600 √¢mes dans la r√©gion de Portneuf, et dont la moiti√© de l‚Äô√©conomie tourne autour de l‚Äôagriculture.



Peu avant No√´l dernier, Rudy Ducreux, un jeune agriculteur d‚Äôorigine fran√ßaise, mettait fin √† ses jours en se pendant dans l‚Äôatelier de sa ferme, la ferme Ducr√™t, situ√©e √† un jet de pierre de la mairie.



Pour les gens du milieu, ce jeune agriculteur √©tait une √©toile filante dans le firmament des fromagers qu√©b√©cois. ¬´ C‚Äô√©tait quelqu‚Äôun d‚Äôassez r√©serv√©. Mais d√®s que vous parliez d‚Äôagriculture, vous constatiez combien il √©tait passionn√©! Ses fromages au lait cru, dont Le Gaulois de Portneuf, √©taient exceptionnels, irrempla√ßables. On ne peut pas se permettre de perdre des gens comme lui ¬ª, raconte Charles Trottier, copropri√©taire de la Fromagerie Des Grondines qui, partageant la m√™me profession, l‚Äôa bien connu.



Les deux fromagers artisans ont pass√© √† travers la crise de la list√©riose de 2008, qui a fait 2 morts et 38 malades, et o√π le gouvernement a fait jeter aux poubelles des milliers de kilogrammes de fromage. Dans un rapport sur la gestion de cette crise (2010), le minist√®re de l‚ÄôAgriculture, des P√™cheries et de l‚ÄôAlimentation (MAPAQ) exon√©rait les fromages au lait cru en identifiant la bact√©rie coupable, le pulsovar 93, une souche de la bact√©rie Lysteria monocytigene, provenant de fromages au lait pasteuris√©. Mais le mal √©tait fait, le Qu√©bec ne compte plus aujourd‚Äôhui, avec le d√©part de Rudy Ducreux, que quatre ou cinq fromagers au lait cru, selon Normand C√¥t√©, pr√©sident de l‚ÄôAssociation des fromagers artisans du Qu√©bec, qui regroupe une trentaine de membres.



Pour op√©rer notre fromagerie, j'ai besoin de 16 √† 17 permis diff√©rents.

‚Äì Charles Trottier



Un m√©tier sous tr√®s haute tension



Le m√©tier de fromager-artisan rel√®ve des 12 travaux d‚ÄôHercule. Il faut traire des vaches 2 fois par jour, 365 jours par ann√©e, car on ne peut pas fermer le pis des vaches comme l‚Äôeau d‚Äôun robinet. Il faut ensuite fabriquer son fromage dans des conditions hygi√©niques aussi salubres qu‚Äôune salle d‚Äôop√©ration d‚Äôh√¥pital. Et il faut l‚Äôemballer, le distribuer et le vendre dans les boutiques sp√©cialis√©es ou les restaurants.



¬´ C‚Äôest trois m√©tiers dans un ¬ª, explique Charles Trottier. Sans compter qu‚Äôil faut composer avec le stress de la m√©t√©o, la ferme √©tant une usine √† ciel ouvert, pour produire des fourrages et des grains afin d‚Äôalimenter les vaches.



C'est dans l'√©tabli de sa ferme que le jeune agriculteur Rudy Ducreux a mis fin √† ses jours.



De plus, ce m√©tier s‚Äôexerce sous une charge administrative kafka√Øenne. ¬´ Pour op√©rer notre fromagerie, j‚Äôai besoin de 16 √† 17 permis diff√©rents, dont un de fabrication du minist√®re de l‚ÄôAgriculture, un permis du minist√®re de l‚ÄôEnvironnement, un permis de transport du lait, de vente au d√©tail, de l‚Äôorganisme de certification biologique, de la municipalit√©‚Ä¶ ¬ª poursuit Charles Trottier.



Comme si cette lourdeur administrative ne suffisait pas, la d√©cision du gouvernement Trudeau de permettre l‚Äôimportation de 16 000 tonnes m√©triques de fromages fins en provenance d‚ÄôEurope d√®s le 21 septembre prochain sous l‚ÄôAccord √©conomique et commercial entre le Canada et l‚ÄôUnion europ√©enne (AECG) risque de faucher plusieurs fromagers artisanaux du terroir qu√©b√©cois. ¬´ Cette importation, c‚Äôest l‚Äô√©quivalent de 640 fermes comme la n√¥tre. Il est illusoire de penser que nous ne serons pas affect√©s ¬ª, croit Charles Trottier.



Depuis ses d√©buts, l‚Äôhomme d‚Äôaffaires a investi 1,8 million $ dans la fromagerie, dont 750 000 $ depuis deux ans, entre autres pour construire une nouvelle √©table. Et il compte sur sa client√®le qu√©b√©coise -- plus de 30 000 personnes visitent la fromagerie chaque ann√©e -- pour survivre.



Contrairement √† Charles Trottier, qui dit travailler plus de 105 √† 110 heures par semaine pour faire tourner la fromagerie avec son associ√© et une vingtaine d‚Äôemploy√©s, ¬´ Rudy, lui, op√©rait seul, avec l‚Äô√©nergie de la jeunesse ¬ª.



C‚Äôest peut-√™tre parce qu‚Äôil devait se battre envers et contre tous que Rudy Ducreux avait surnomm√© son produit vedette ¬´ Le Gaulois de Portneuf ¬ª, gagnant d‚Äôun prix Caseus (2011), sorte de Jeux olympiques annuels du fromage.



Charles Trottier, co-propri√©taire de la Fromagerie Des Grondines, a bien connu Rudy Ducreux, un champion fromager.



Combien d‚Äôagriculteurs se suicident?

¬´ Je ne sais pas dans quelle mesure le cas de Rudy Ducreux est repr√©sentatif de l‚Äô√©tat psychologique de l‚Äôensemble des producteurs laitiers du Qu√©bec ¬ª, dit Ginette Lafleur, doctorante au Centre de recherche et d‚Äôintervention sur le suicide et l‚Äôeuthanasie (CRISE) √† l‚ÄôUQAM. Si les fromagers artisans ne transforment qu‚Äôune goutte de lait produite par les quelque 5 600 fermes laiti√®res du Qu√©bec, ils sont le porte-√©tendard d‚Äôune industrie qui g√©n√®re pr√®s de 30 % de toutes les recettes agricoles de la province.



Selon la doctorante, le m√©tier d‚Äôagriculteur est reconnu comme l'un des plus √† risque de stress √† cause d‚Äô√©l√©ments incontr√¥lables comme la m√©t√©o. Mais la mondialisation, les trait√©s commerciaux, le prix du lait, le prix du quota, l‚Äôendettement des entreprises, les changements technologiques, les conflits familiaux, les chicanes de couple ou l‚Äôisolement sont tous des facteurs de stress qui s‚Äôadditionnent et font grimper le taux de la d√©tresse psychologique. ¬´ Jusqu‚Äô√† ce que l‚Äô√©lastique p√®te ¬ª, explique celle qui a √©tudi√© le malaise des agriculteurs tant au Qu√©bec qu‚Äôen France et en Suisse1.



Toutefois, la seule √©tude disponible sur le taux de suicide des agriculteurs qu√©b√©cois indiquait qu‚Äôil √©tait le double de celui des hommes dans la population g√©n√©rale qu√©b√©coise. Mais cette √©tude2 r√©alis√©e par Sant√© Canada date de trente ans (1971-1987). Le probl√®me, pour obtenir l‚Äôheure juste, c‚Äôest que l‚ÄôInstitut national de la sant√© publique du Qu√©bec ne comptabilise pas les suicides par profession. En 2014, 845 Qu√©b√©cois se sont enlev√© la vie et, depuis 1981, cette triste statistique annuelle oscille entre 795 et 1284 hommes.



Parmi les pays d√©velopp√©s, la France s‚Äôest toutefois dot√©e en 2013 d‚Äôun Observatoire national du suicide qui d√©nombre 417 suicides chez les hommes agriculteurs entre 2007 √† 2009, surtout dans les √©levages de bovins.



Rudy Ducreux, l‚Äôarbre qui cache la for√™t?



Notre enqu√™te r√©v√®le cependant que le ph√©nom√®ne du suicide des agriculteurs existe bel et bien dans la campagne qu√©b√©coise. Parlez-en √† Laurier Gauthier, un voisin de Rudy Ducreux. L‚Äôhomme de 67 ans est producteur de lait et copropri√©taire avec ses fr√®res de la seconde plus grosse √©rabli√®re de la Belle Province. Il a offert de nous accompagner √† la ferme Ducr√™t.

La vraie raison profonde, les gens partent avec.

‚Äì Laurier Gauthier

En chemin, √† bord de son camion, M. Gauthier lance devant la ferme d‚Äôun de ses voisins. ¬´ Lui aussi il s‚Äôest suicid√©. Puis pourtant, il avait de l‚Äôargent plein les poches. Il venait de s‚Äôacheter une Cadillac. Un bon matin, on apprend qu‚Äôil s‚Äô√©tait tir√© un coup de 22 en arri√®re des oreilles. Surprise totale ¬ª. Il ajoute avoir connu six personnes, dont cinq producteurs et un employ√© de ferme, qui se sont enlev√© la vie dans un rayon de 12 kilom√®tres de son entreprise.



Quant au geste irr√©m√©diable de Rudy Ducreux, M. Gauthier l‚Äôexplique peut-√™tre par une charge de travail trop lourde pour un seul homme, mais, ¬´ la vraie raison profonde, les gens partent avec ¬ª, dit-il. Maire de Saint-Basile durant une trentaine d‚Äôann√©es, le producteur pointe du doigt l‚Äôactuel contexte socio-√©conomique comme facteur important de d√©tresse psychologique chez les producteurs agricoles. Il reproche √† Qu√©bec, depuis le r√®gne du ministre de l‚ÄôAgriculture p√©quiste Jean Garon (1976-1985), champion de la souverainet√© alimentaire, de nommer des ministres de l‚ÄôAgriculture √† temps partiel ou ignorant des enjeux.



Quant au f√©d√©ral, le producteur se demande jusqu‚Äôo√π Ottawa, dans l‚Äôactuelle ren√©gociation de l‚ÄôALENA exig√©e par le pr√©sident Donald Trump, est pr√™t √† d√©fendre la gestion de l‚Äôoffre et ne pas la sacrifier au profit des secteurs du bois d‚Äô≈ìuvre, de l‚Äôautomobile ou de l‚Äôaviation.



Nous arrivons √† la ferme Ducr√™t. Rudy Ducreux avait achet√© en 2004 la ferme de Luc Mailloux, un ex-fromager au lait cru, et fr√®re du psychiatre controvers√© Pierre ¬´ Doc ¬ª Mailloux. Sur place, nous sommes accueillis par Connie McLellan, une jeune agricultrice de 28 ans originaire de Nouvelle-√âcosse. Elle h√©site √† parler au journaliste, selon les conseils de l‚Äôavocat engag√© par la succession ¬´ pour ne pas nuire √† la vente de la ferme ¬ª, pr√©vue d‚Äôici l‚Äôautomne. Le corps de Rudy Ducreux a depuis longtemps √©t√© rapatri√© par la famille.



Connie McLellan, une jeune productrice, s'occupe du troupeau de Rudy Ducreux.



La jeune femme explique avoir √©t√© recrut√©e pour traire le troupeau de 26 b√™tes. √Ä part le cliquetis des cha√Ænes des vaches √† l‚Äô√©table, le silence r√®gne autour de la maison, de la fromagerie, de l‚Äô√©tabli et des remises d√©sert√©s. Seul un chat en manque de caresses nous suit d‚Äôun b√¢timent √† l‚Äôautre.



Dans les champs adjacents, de la machinerie rouille au milieu de hautes herbes. Et on peut apercevoir de nouvelles plantations d‚Äôarbres sur les terres voisines autrefois cultiv√©es. Comme l‚Äôarbre qui cache la for√™t, le suicide du cr√©ateur du Gaulois de Portneuf cache un pan de l‚Äôagriculture qu√©b√©coise en p√©ril.

SUMMARY:
Ce thriller tennistique -incarn√© √† l'√©cran par Sverrir Gudnason et Shia LaBoeuf- raconte la rivalit√© entre une star montante du tennis et le meilleur joueur de l'√©poque.
Le duel Borg-McEnroe est celui de la glace et du feu.
Un duel entre "gentleman" et "rebelle" comme seul le tennis peut en produire, racont√© avec passion et psychologie √† travers un match d'anthologie.
Le burn-out de BorgBj√∂rn Borg appara√Æt en effet fatigu√© par les sollicitations permanentes dues √† son statut de rockstar du tennis.
"On ne montre pas la faiblesse"√Ä cela s'ajoute la pression m√©diatique, les sollicitations du public et l'exigence de r√©sultat.
TEXT:
SPORT - Pour beaucoup, il s'agit du plus grand match de l'histoire du tennis. Wimbledon, 5 juillet 1980: le spectaculaire John McEnroe affronte l'insubmersible su√©dois Bj√∂rn Borg en qu√™te d'un cinqui√®me sacre cons√©cutif √† Londres. Un affrontement grandiose rest√© dans l'histoire du tennis, mis en lumi√®re par Janus Metz Pedersen, le r√©alisateur du film "Borg/McEnroe" qui sort en France ce mercredi 8 novembre.

Ce thriller tennistique -incarn√© √† l'√©cran par Sverrir Gudnason et Shia LaBoeuf- raconte la rivalit√© entre une star montante du tennis et le meilleur joueur de l'√©poque. On y d√©couvre un John McEnroe provocateur, g√©nial, volcanique et admiratif d'un Bj√∂rn Borg au sommet de son art. Le Su√©dois, surnomm√© "Ice Borg" en raison de son caract√®re imperturbable, myst√©rieux... presque mystique, appara√Æt comme l'exact oppos√© de son rival.

Le duel Borg-McEnroe est celui de la glace et du feu. Borg est droitier, McEnroe gaucher. Le premier est un m√©tronome qui an√©antit les intentions adverses, alors que le second est un attaquant flamboyant aimant√© par le filet. Un duel entre "gentleman" et "rebelle" comme seul le tennis peut en produire, racont√© avec passion et psychologie √† travers un match d'anthologie.

Outre la dimension sportive de cette rivalit√©, le film met en lumi√®re la difficult√© pour un sportif de g√©rer la pression du haut niveau.

Le burn-out de Borg

Bj√∂rn Borg appara√Æt en effet fatigu√© par les sollicitations permanentes dues √† son statut de rockstar du tennis. Une situation d√©licate √† g√©rer pour lui et son entourage, qui l'a d'ailleurs pouss√© √† mettre un terme √† sa carri√®re le 23 janvier 1983 √† seulement 26 ans.

"Il √©tait exasp√©r√© par les sollicitations. Il a port√© ce poids sans ne rien faire para√Ætre pendant des ann√©es. Et puis il y a eu un trop plein", raconte Jean Couvercelle, fondateur de Tennis magazine et ami de Bj√∂rn Borg au HuffPost. "Il √©tait sollicit√© en permanence. Il aimait la vie, il aimait sortir, mais c'√©tait rarissime: son comportement, son allure, son physique, son jeu, tout l'exposait au regard des autres et aux questions", explique-t-il.

Align√© en Coupe Davis d√®s ses 15 ans, Bj√∂rn Borg est l'un des premiers tennisman √† avoir commenc√© sa carri√®re aussi t√¥t. L'un des premiers √©galement a consacrer toute sa vie et tous ses efforts √† son sport. Une pr√©cocit√©, un travail acharn√© et un caract√®re plut√¥t introverti peuvent √™tre les facteurs de cette lassitude et de ce brun-out, un ph√©nom√®ne assez m√©connu dans le sport mais qui touche de plus en plus d'athl√®tes.

Un ph√©nom√®ne qui semble s'√©tendre

En mai 2017, un joueur de foot sur trois √©tait au bord du burn-out, selon une √©tude du syndicat international des footballeurs. En dehors des pelouses, Andr√© Agassi, Yannick Noah, Novak Djokovic, Marion Bartoli, Laure Manaudou... tous ont connu des √©pisodes de d√©pression ou de burn-out plus ou moins longs au cours de leur carri√®re. "Ce ph√©nom√®ne a toujours exist√©, mais d√©sormais, on met des mots dessus", estime la docteure en psychologie du sport Sophie Huguet au HuffPost.

Plusieurs facteurs semblent d√©sormais √©tendre ce ph√©nom√®ne. Le Dr Vincent Gouttebarge, chef m√©dical du syndicat des footballeurs explique que "600 facteurs sp√©cifiques" pouvant entra√Æner des troubles psychologiques chez les sportifs ont ainsi √©t√© identifi√©s. Parmi eux "les blessures graves, des mauvaises conditions de travail, la pression du r√©sultat, des m√©dias, du public... ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã", explique-t-il √† So Foot.

"Les sportifs sont rep√©r√©s de plus en plus t√¥t. Ils commencent les comp√©titions plus jeunes, et la pression des parents se fait, dans certains cas, de plus en plus forte", explique pour sa part Sophie Huguet qui pointe les disciplines de "souffrance" comme l'athl√©tisme, la natation ou la gymnastique en particulier. Des sports pratiqu√©s d√®s l'enfance, qui peuvent avoir tendance √† lasser, voire d√©go√ªter les athl√®tes lorsqu'ils atteignent le haut niveau.

"On ne montre pas la faiblesse"

√Ä cela s'ajoute la pression m√©diatique, les sollicitations du public et l'exigence de r√©sultat. "Ces sportifs aiment jouer mais ils ne sont pas forc√©ment enclins √† √™tre devant les m√©dias", r√©sume Sophie Huguet qui pointe √©galement la pression des sponsors et l'exigence pour les meilleurs de rester au sommet.

Malgr√© cela, il existe une certaine omerta dans le monde du sport. "L'image d'un sportif qui fait un burn-out va √† l'encontre de l'image de l'homme d'exploit et de performance qu'il v√©hicule en temps normal. Donc on ne montre pas les images de faiblesse", explique Sophie Huguet. Elle estime, par ailleurs, que si les sportifs se taisent c'est aussi parce que leur mal-√™tre pourrait √™tre incompris par des fans qui voit en eux des personnes privil√©gi√©es.

Cependant, malgr√© les univers masculins comme celui du football dans lesquels "on n'affiche pas forc√©ment ses √©tats d'√¢mes", "les sportifs parlent de plus en plus du fait qu'ils ne sont pas invincibles", estime Sophie Huguet. Teddy Riner confie par exemple, "travailler avec un psychologue pour g√©rer au mieux la pression", depuis son adolescence. Le genre de t√©moignage qui "font bouger les choses", selon elle.
TITLE: Le film "Borg/McEnroe" montre le burn-out de Bj√∂rn Borg, et il n‚Äôest pas le seul sportif dans ce cas

Student in BerlinEigentlich ist es nicht meine Art, Dinge, die mich pers√∂nlich betreffen, jedem auf die Nase zu binden.
Und ich hoffe, es hilft, euch alle wachzur√ºtteln und klarzumachen: Nein, es ist nicht alles okay in unserem Land.
Ich habe schon vieles erlebt, was ich niemandem w√ºnsche und meistens habe ich mich allein durchgek√§mpft.
Nur als ich Opfer einer Sexualstraftat wurde, hab ich es nicht mehr alleine geschafft.
Meine Mama kommt aus Deutschland, mein Papa kommt aus Ghana und ich komme aus Berlin.
TEXT:
Erzieherin (Name ge√§ndert)

Als Erzieher ist es heutzutage kaum mehr m√∂glich, sich auf die Bed√ºrfnisse der Kinder zu konzentrieren, da einige Eltern ihre eigenen Bed√ºrfnisse beim Personal an erster Stelle sehen. Man verbringt Stunden damit, sich vor den Eltern im Flur zu rechtfertigen.

Dass die schicke Zahnarztpraxis im Bezirk der Zahn√§rztekammer Nordrhein einen besonderen Anspruch hat, wusste Herr S. Dass er dort sein blaues Wunder erleben sollte, das ahnte er freilich nicht, als er sich dort in den Behandlungsstuhl setzte.

Student in Berlin

Eigentlich ist es nicht meine Art, Dinge, die mich pers√∂nlich betreffen, jedem auf die Nase zu binden. Aber dieses Mal muss ich es einfach tun. Und ich hoffe, es hilft, euch alle wachzur√ºtteln und klarzumachen: Nein, es ist nicht alles okay in unserem Land.

Ich habe schon vieles erlebt, was ich niemandem w√ºnsche und meistens habe ich mich allein durchgek√§mpft. Nur als ich Opfer einer Sexualstraftat wurde, hab ich es nicht mehr alleine geschafft. Auch wegen des Verhaltens der Menschen um mich herum danach.

Meine Mama kommt aus Deutschland, mein Papa kommt aus Ghana und ich komme aus Berlin. Ich bin dunkelh√§utig und Deutsche. Trotzdem muss ich mich jeden Tag fragen: Was ist eigentlich euer Problem mit mir?

In der deutschen Bev√∂lkerung herrscht Angst. Keine Angst vor Kriegen, vor Krankheit oder Hunger - die Deutschen haben Angst voreinander. Was das f√ºr Auswirkungen hat, musste ich vor Kurzem erleben.

Ein √§lterer Mann war gerade dabei, den Kofferraum zu √∂ffnen. Rechts neben dem Auto stand eine junge Frau, vielleicht seine Tochter, mit einem Kopftuch. Auf beide waren Gewehre gerichtet. Ich war direkt in einen √úberfall geraten.

Als mein Sohn Oscar drei Stunden alt war, begann er zu glucksen. Die Hebamme kam herein, um nachzusehen, wie es uns beiden ging. Da erz√§hlte ich ihr gl√ºcklich, dass Oscar bereits lachte. Die Hebamme nahm ihn mir sofort aus dem Arm und dr√ºckte den Notfallausl√∂ser.

Die Wahrheit ist: Mein Exfreund war mir gegen√ºber gewaltt√§tig. Dennoch begegnet mir nahezu jede Person, der ich davon erz√§hle, mit Zweifeln. Sie denken, dass ich √ºbertreibe oder l√ºge, wenn ich berichte, was er mir angetan hat.

Journalist, Name ge√§ndert

Sie wohnte seit ihrem 18. Lebensjahr allein, finanzierte sich w√§hrend der Schule abwechselnd durch Baf√∂g, Hartz IV und Kellner-Jobs. Trotzdem machte sie einen Abschluss an einer bilingualen Schule, bekam ein Abi-Zeugnis, von dem ich nur h√§tte tr√§umen k√∂nnen.

Unsere Kinder, die heute eingeschult werden, gehen im Jahr 2070 in Rente. Doch unsere Schulen √ºberh√§ufen sie mit Wissensanforderungen, die aus der Vergangenheit stammen.

Die Tauben im Park erkennen mich sofort, wenn sie mich sehen. In Scharen kommen sie auf mich zugeflogen und setzen sich auf meinen Kopf und meine Schultern. Deshalb nennen die Leute in New York mich nur noch "Paul, den Taubenmann".
TITLE: HuffPost

ADVERTISEMENTBHOPAL -- In light of the horrific gang-rape of a 19-year-old girl, a city Superintendent of Police (CSP) and three Town Inspectors (SHOs in other states) have faced action.
The actions were taken on directions from Chief minister Shivraj Singh ChouhanThe girl was gangrape and later abandoned near the railway track in Bhopal.
The accused cornered and overpowered her, took her to a desolate spot near the railway track, close to the Habibganj station, and raped her.
The accused escaped, leaving the injured girl in the bushes near the railway track, close to Railway Protection Force (RPF) police station.
The MP Human Rights Commission has sought a report from Bhopal police on the incident that has left Bhopal in shock.
TEXT:
ADVERTISEMENT

BHOPAL -- In light of the horrific gang-rape of a 19-year-old girl, a city Superintendent of Police (CSP) and three Town Inspectors (SHOs in other states) have faced action. The inspectors who head MP Nagar, Habibganj and GRP police stations have been suspended. The CSP (DSP rank) has been removed and sent to the police headquarters.

Action was taken over the delay in registering an FIR, the harassment caused to the girl and her family. They were turned away from police stations, and despite the horrific crime, and the policemen didn't give a patient hearing to her, let alone registering case.

The actions were taken on directions from Chief minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan

The girl was gangrape and later abandoned near the railway track in Bhopal.

Four men accosted the girl, who is pursuing graduation and preparing for civil services exam, when she was returning from her tuition classes. The accused cornered and overpowered her, took her to a desolate spot near the railway track, close to the Habibganj station, and raped her.

The survivor somehow managed to drag herself to the police station and informed her parents, both of whom are police personnel.

The accused escaped, leaving the injured girl in the bushes near the railway track, close to Railway Protection Force (RPF) police station.

The survivor somehow managed to drag herself to the police station and informed her parents, both of whom are police personnel.

Still, none of the two police stations ‚Äî MP Nagar and Habibganj, both in the heart of New Bhopal ‚Äî registered a case, passing the buck on officials of other police stations, saying that area didn't fall under their jurisdiction.

Finally, the railway police registered a case. DSP Anita Malviya told media persons that the girl was gang-raped by four youths ‚Äî Golu Chadhar, Amar, Rajesh and Ramesh. She said that the accused have been arrested.

Minister for Women and Child Development, Archana Chitnis, called it a shameful incident and demanded death penalty for the culprits.

The incident had occurred late Tuesday night and throughout Wednesday the traumatised family had tried to get an FIR registered, until railway police registered the case.

Deputy Inspector General of Police (DIG) Bhopal had ordered a probe into the apathy of the policemen in question.

The MP Human Rights Commission has sought a report from Bhopal police on the incident that has left Bhopal in shock.

The Opposition has targeted the government blaming it for poor control law-and-order. Minister for Women and Child Development, Archana Chitnis, called it a shameful incident and demanded death penalty for the culprits.
TITLE: Three Policemen Face Action After Horrific Gang-Rape of 19-Year-Old In Bhopal

La guardia del corpo ha lavorato per la Carey dal giugno 2015 al maggio 2017 e in tale periodo sarebbe stata continuamente umiliata dall'artista, che ha insinuato Anello di essere un nazista, uno skinhead, un membro del Ku Klux Klan e un suprematista bianco.
Del resto, Anello ha accusato la cantante di volersi circondare solamente di uomini di colore.
Il contenzioso √® anche di natura economica, con la guardia del corpo che lamenta una fattura da 221.329,51 dollari mai saldata dalla Carey per i due anni di lavoro con lei.
Il sito di informazione ha tentato di contattare Mariah Carey, ma non ha ottenuto alcuna risposta dal suo entourage.
TEXT:
C'√® anche Mariah Carey tra le star americane che potrebbero passare dei guai seri a causa della sue abitudini sessuali. Secondo un'esclusiva del sito di informazione TMZ, infatti, l'agenzia che si occupava della sicurezza della cantante di Touch My Body sta per denunciarla per molestie sessuali e razzismo contro il suo body guard Michael Anello, titolare dell'agenzia stessa.

La guardia del corpo ha lavorato per la Carey dal giugno 2015 al maggio 2017 e in tale periodo sarebbe stata continuamente umiliata dall'artista, che ha insinuato Anello di essere un nazista, uno skinhead, un membro del Ku Klux Klan e un suprematista bianco. Del resto, Anello ha accusato la cantante di volersi circondare solamente di uomini di colore.

Inoltre, l'interprete di All I Want For Christmas Is You avrebbe "commesso atti sessuali con l'intento di venir osservata da Anello", come si legge nella relazione preparata dal legale dell'uomo. In particolare, durante una trasferta di Mariah a Cabo San Lucas la cantante avrebbe chiesto al body guard di portare alcune valigie nella sua camera d'albergo, salvo poi trovarla seminuda, con addosso solo un neglig√© trasparente e aperto. Anello prov√≤ quindi ad uscire dalla stanza, ma lei insistette per farlo rimanere, senza successo. Non ci comunque contatto tra i due.

Il contenzioso √® anche di natura economica, con la guardia del corpo che lamenta una fattura da 221.329,51 dollari mai saldata dalla Carey per i due anni di lavoro con lei. Stando a quanto appreso da TMZ, luned√¨ 6 novembre ci sarebbe stato un incontro tra l'artista e Anello, per tentare un accordo prima di passare alle via legali; Anello non sarebbe rimasto soddisfatto della proposta economica avanzata dalla sua ex cliente.

Il sito di informazione ha tentato di contattare Mariah Carey, ma non ha ottenuto alcuna risposta dal suo entourage. Le accuse alla cantante arrivano in un periodo burrascoso per le star a stelle e strisce: volti noti come Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Spacey, Ed Westwick - oltre al produttore Harvey Weinstein - sono stati incolpati di molestie e finanche violenze sessuali. Molti miti stanno crollando.
TITLE: "Mariah Carey ha molestato sessualmente la sua guardia del corpo"

TEXT:
In San Francisco steht ein Haus, das auf den ersten Blick wie ein gew√∂hnliches Reihenhaus aussieht

Wer es jedoch betritt, dem wird klar, weshalb es fast 10 Millionen Euro kostet

Wie es von innen aussieht, seht ihr im Video oben

In der Chenery Street in San Francisco steht ein Haus, das auf den ersten Blick wie ein gew√∂hnliches Reihenhaus aussieht. Doch dieser Eindruck t√§uscht - hinter der Fassade des Hauses versteckt sich mehr. Das Haupthaus erstreckt sich auf drei Geb√§udeeinheiten, die an die Stra√üe angrenzen.

Wenn man es betritt, k√∂nnte man meinen, in einer Villa aus einem James Bond-Film zu sein.

Das Haupthaus sieht n√§mlich aus wie ein eindrucksvoller Palast ‚Äì mit Glasdach und einem Swimmingpool im Speisesaal. Im Hauptgeb√§ude sind Buntglasfenster der ehemaligen Kirche Little Sisters of the Poor verbaut.

Das Haus wurde im Jahr 1987 erbaut

Das Glasdach der Villa l√§sst sich zudem zur Seite fahren, damit die Sonnenstrahlen auch ungefiltert in das Innere des Hauses fallen k√∂nnen. Im Hauptgeb√§ude befinden sich f√ºnf Schlafzimmer und genauso viele B√§der. Im Obergeschoss der Villa hat man einen atemberaubenden Blick auf die Skyline von San Francisco.

Die Villa wurde im Jahr 1987 f√ºr den Werbefachmann Robert Pritikin gebaut. Derzeit steht das Anwesen zum Verkauf. Wer es haben m√∂chte, muss aber tief in die Tasche greifen: Das Anwesen kostet elf Millionen Dollar, also umgerechnet knapp zehn Millionen Euro.

(lp)
TITLE: Es sieht aus wie ein ganz gew√∂hnliches Haus - doch es kostet nicht ohne Grund 10 Millionen Euro
