SUMMARY:
Lo scrive in un post sul suo profilo Facebook il neo deputato regionale dell'Udc Cateno De Luca, arrestato oggi con l'accusa di evasione fiscale e posto ai domiciliari.
Cateno De Luca √® finito in manette questa mattina, ad appena due giorni dalla sua elezione nelle fila dell'Udc con oltre 5 mila preferenze.
Cateno De Luca √® accusato di associazione per delinquere finalizzata alla commissione di delitti in materia di imposte sui redditi e sul valore aggiunto.
De Luca aveva chiesto alla Suprema Corte di trasferire a Reggio Calabria il processo che lo vede imputato.
Cos√¨ il presidente della Regione siciliana Nello Musumeci, sull'arresto del deputato dell'Udc Cateno De Luca.
TEXT:
"Sapevo gi√† che mi avrebbero arrestato ... perch√© gi√† certi ambienti mi avevano avvertito! E oggi pi√π di ieri vi dico che anche questo procedimento finir√† come gli altri quattordici: archiviati o con sentenza di assoluzione. Nei prossimi giorni saprete il perch√© non vogliono che io faccia il sindaco di Messina". Lo scrive in un post sul suo profilo Facebook il neo deputato regionale dell'Udc Cateno De Luca, arrestato oggi con l'accusa di evasione fiscale e posto ai domiciliari. "Pregate per me e per la mia famiglia e per gli altri indagati che nulla c'entrano in questa storia", aggiunge De Luca.

Cateno De Luca √® finito in manette questa mattina, ad appena due giorni dalla sua elezione nelle fila dell'Udc con oltre 5 mila preferenze. Il suo nome rientra tra gli impresentabili che hanno aiutato Nello Musumeci a vincere la contesa elettorale siciliana.

De Luca √® stato arrestato, in esecuzione di un provvedimento cautelare emesso dal Gip del Tribunale di Messina a conclusione di articolate e complesse indagini coordinate dalla Procura della Repubblica di Messina, dai militari del Nucleo di Polizia Tributaria della Guardia di Finanza di Messina e della Compagnia Carabinieri di Messina Sud. Il parlamentare √® stato sottoposto alla misura cautelare degli arresti domiciliari. Con lui ai domiciliari anche Carmelo Satta. I due sono finiti agli arresti, "in qualit√† di promotori di un'associazione per delinquere finalizzata alla realizzazione di una rilevante evasione fiscale di circa 1.750.000 euro", come dice la Gdf. Nel dettaglio, attraverso le indagini √® stato individuato "un complesso reticolo societario facente capo alla Federazione Nazionale Autonoma Piccoli Imprenditori ed alla societ√† Caf Fe.Na.Pi srl, riconducibile, direttamente o indirettamente, a De Luca e a Saitta, utilizzato, nel corso del tempo, per porre in essere un sofisticato sistema di fatturazioni fittizie finalizzate all'evasione delle imposte dirette ed indirette", dicono gli inquirenti.

Chi √® "sCateno" De Luca. Il feudo messinese, due arresti e la lotta contro la "malarazza politica"

In sintesi, lo schema evasivo emerso prevedeva l'imputazione di costi inesistenti, da parte della Federazione Nazionale a vantaggio del Caf fenapi s.r.l., "individuato quale principale centro degli interessi economici del sodalizio criminale. La frode si √® sviluppata basandosi sul trasferimento di materia imponibile dal Caf alla Federazione Nazionale, in virt√π del regime fiscale di favore applicato a quest'ultima, che ha determinato un notevole risparmio di imposta". Al termine dell'attivit√† investigativa √® stato individuato un indebito risparmio di imposta pari a circa 1.750.000 (sia ai fini Iva che delle Imposte sui redditi delle societ√†). Oltre alle due persone sottoposte agli arresti, sono state deferite a piede libero altri 8 associati. Contestualmente √® stata disposta l'esecuzione del sequestro preventivo per equivalente fino all'ammontare dell'indebito risparmio di imposta, sia nei confronti degli arrestati che nei confronti della societ√† Caf Fenapi s.r.l., nei cui confronti √® stata applicata la normativa in materia di responsabilit√† amministrativa degli enti.

Cateno De Luca √® accusato di associazione per delinquere finalizzata alla commissione di delitti in materia di imposte sui redditi e sul valore aggiunto. Inoltre, gli viene contestato, insieme con gli altri indagati, il reato associativo. Il neo deputato regionale Udc era gi√† finito in manette nell'ambito dell'inchiesta per i lavori realizzati a Fiumedinisi (Messina). Di recente la Procura ha chiesto per lui la condanna a 5 anni di carcere. La sentenza √® attesa prima di Natale. De Luca aveva chiesto alla Suprema Corte di trasferire a Reggio Calabria il processo che lo vede imputato. Ma per i giudici della Suprema Corte il ricorso non √® trattabile. Quindi il processo resta a Messina.

La nota dell'Udc. "L'Udc ha appreso dalla stampa la notizia dell'arresto di De Luca. L'Udc ha avuto la massima diligenza nella formazione delle liste elettorali a tutela del partito e dei cittadini-elettori. Abbiamo chiesto a tutti i candidati dell'Udc e dei movimenti ad esso associati tra cui anche Sicilia Vera il certificato del casellario giudiziario e quello dei carichi pendenti a tutela dei cittadini e della onorabilit√† del partito" si legge in una nota diffusa dall'ufficio stampa nazionale del partito. "Abbiamo fiducia nella magistratura che siamo certi porter√† all'accertamento della verit√† e siamo convinti che De Luca sar√† in grado di chiarire i fatti e di dimostrare la sua innocenza".

Musumeci: "Io prudente anche sulla Giunta". "Se nella fase di composizione delle liste qualcuno non ha seguito i miei reiterati inviti alla prudenza, tutte le scelte che dipenderanno da me, invece, saranno improntate a questo criterio, nel rispetto delle mie convinzioni e in coerenza con la mia storia personale, a cominciare dalla formazione della giunta". Cos√¨ il presidente della Regione siciliana Nello Musumeci, sull'arresto del deputato dell'Udc Cateno De Luca.

"I provvedimenti della magistratura, alla quale rinnovo fiducia e apprezzamento, si rispettano e non si commentano" ha aggiunto Musumeci. "La legge vigente - ha detto - mette le istituzioni al riparo da casi come quello odierno e la sua applicazione sar√† garanzia di legalit√†".
TITLE: Cateno De Luca, neoeletto in Sicilia nelle fila dell'Udc, arrestato per evasione fiscale. "Sapevo che sarebbe successo"

SUMMARY:
Labour MP Dawn Butler has retracted her demand that an independent investigation be launched into how Welsh Labour handled allegations against Carl Sargeant.
Sargeant was found dead on Tuesday after he was sacked from his post as Welsh communities secretary following what he called ‚Äúshocking and distressing‚Äù allegations about his conduct.
Butler, the shadow minister for women and equalities, told BBC Radio 5 Live on Wednesday that how the accusations against Sargeant were handled needed ‚Äúto be fully investigated‚Äù.
However following the broadcast she issued a clarification and withdrew her comment.
‚ÄúAfter giving an interview this morning, I have looked further into the process followed in this case,‚Äù she said.
TEXT:
Labour MP Dawn Butler has retracted her demand that an independent investigation be launched into how Welsh Labour handled allegations against Carl Sargeant.

Sargeant was found dead on Tuesday after he was sacked from his post as Welsh communities secretary following what he called ‚Äúshocking and distressing‚Äù allegations about his conduct. It is understood he took his own life.

Butler, the shadow minister for women and equalities, told BBC Radio 5 Live on Wednesday that how the accusations against Sargeant were handled needed ‚Äúto be fully investigated‚Äù.

She said: ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt sound as though everything that should have happened, happened‚Äù.

However following the broadcast she issued a clarification and withdrew her comment.

‚ÄúAfter giving an interview this morning, I have looked further into the process followed in this case,‚Äù she said.

‚ÄúI am satisfied that the appropriate process was followed, including preserving the anonymity of alleged victims at this stage of the process, and therefore do not feel an investigation is required.‚Äù

Sargeant‚Äôs family have released correspondence indicating that he was facing allegations of ‚Äúunwanted attention, inappropriate touching or groping‚Äù - which he denied.
TITLE: Dawn Butler Retracts Demand For Investigation Into How Labour Handled Carl Sargeant Allegations

SUMMARY:
ADVERTISEMENTOn October 31, a 19-year-old college student, who was returning home from her coaching class, was gang raped in Bhopal.
A week on, the Madhya Pradesh government has responded to the public furore by ordering coaching centres to not hold classes after 8 pm.
Even though it is the state's obligation to ensure that public spaces are safe for women, the government has decreed that coaching centres that don't close by 8:00 pm will be responsible for safety of the female students.
"We have decided to direct all coaching centres to wind up their business not later than 8pm.
Joshi said that coaching centres will also be asked to develop an an app with an SOS and location-tracking system for students.
TEXT:
ADVERTISEMENT

On October 31, a 19-year-old college student, who was returning home from her coaching class, was gang raped in Bhopal. NDTV has previously reported that the college student was ambushed at around 7:00 pm and raped by four men near the Habibganj Railway station, one of the busiest parts of the city. The four men reportedly took tea and tobacco breaks while raping the student for three hours.

A week on, the Madhya Pradesh government has responded to the public furore by ordering coaching centres to not hold classes after 8 pm.

Even though it is the state's obligation to ensure that public spaces are safe for women, the government has decreed that coaching centres that don't close by 8:00 pm will be responsible for safety of the female students.

"We have decided to direct all coaching centres to wind up their business not later than 8pm. If they refuse to do so, they will be held responsible for their girl students' safety after 8pm," School Education Minister Deepak Joshi told the media on Monday.

Joshi said that coaching centres will also be asked to develop an an app with an SOS and location-tracking system for students.

Also on HuffPost India:
TITLE: MP Govt. Responds To Bhopal Gang Rape By Asking Coaching Centres To Close At 8:00 PM

SUMMARY:
A Secret Santa gift seems like it should be an easy one to pick out.
To start your Secret Santa adventure, find out the rules for the exchange and if there‚Äôs a price limit, stick to it.
Try choosing a unisex gift if you‚Äôre participating in a Yankee Swap or white elephant exchange, because your gift could end up in anybody‚Äôs hands.
But when done right, Secret Santa exchanges can be a lot of fun for both the giver and the receiver.
These 13 gift suggestions all come in at under $25 and are appropriate both for exchanges among friends and those among people you work with.
TEXT:
A Secret Santa gift seems like it should be an easy one to pick out. Get something inexpensive, not too personal and keep it appropriate for Christmas. But it can get difficult to find a gift that strikes the right note between appropriate for co-workers or acquaintances and still thoughtful and appreciated.

To start your Secret Santa adventure, find out the rules for the exchange and if there‚Äôs a price limit, stick to it. Going all out and getting a gift well above the set limit just makes the other participants feel out of place. Next, try to suss out something about your recipient‚Äôs interests with a bit of detective work. You don‚Äôt want to give the office teetotaller a bottle of wine, for example.

Try choosing a unisex gift if you‚Äôre participating in a Yankee Swap or white elephant exchange, because your gift could end up in anybody‚Äôs hands. And if you simply can‚Äôt afford to participate, it‚Äôs okay to bow out before names have been picked to avoid complicating things for the other participants.

But when done right, Secret Santa exchanges can be a lot of fun for both the giver and the receiver. These 13 gift suggestions all come in at under $25 and are appropriate both for exchanges among friends and those among people you work with.
TITLE: Christmas Gift Ideas For Secret Santa Under $25

ADVERTISEMENTNEW DELHI -- Revenue Secretary Hasmukh Adhia has been designated as the new Finance Secretary, an official order said today.
Adhia is a 1981 batch IAS officer of Gujarat cadre.
The Appointments Committee of the Cabinet has approved designating Adhia as the Finance Secretary, the order issued by the Department of Personnel and Training said.
As per the convention, the senior most Secretary in the Finance Ministry is designated as the Finance Secretary.
There are five departments under the Finance Ministry-- Expenditure, Economic Affairs, Financial Services, Revenue and Department of Investment and Public Asset management (DIPAM).
TEXT:
ADVERTISEMENT

NEW DELHI -- Revenue Secretary Hasmukh Adhia has been designated as the new Finance Secretary, an official order said today.

Adhia is a 1981 batch IAS officer of Gujarat cadre.

The vacancy was caused following the superannuation of Ashok Lavasa last month.

The Appointments Committee of the Cabinet has approved designating Adhia as the Finance Secretary, the order issued by the Department of Personnel and Training said.

As per the convention, the senior most Secretary in the Finance Ministry is designated as the Finance Secretary.

There are five departments under the Finance Ministry-- Expenditure, Economic Affairs, Financial Services, Revenue and Department of Investment and Public Asset management (DIPAM).

IAS officer Rajiv Kumar of 1984 batch is the Financial Services Secretary. Ajay Narayan Jha is Expenditure Secretary and Neeraj Kumar Gupta Secretary, DIPAM. Both are 1982 batch IAS officers.
TITLE: Hasmukh Adhia, The Man Behind Demonetisation, Made Finance Secretary

ADVERTISEMENTEven as the death toll in the massive explosion in NTPC's Unchahar plant in Uttar Pradesh's Rae Bareli district today rose to 26, survivors' account reveal the intensity of the blast.
#WATCH Congress Vice President Rahul Gandhi reaches Rae Bareli district hospital to meet those injured in #NTPCExplosion.
50,000 each for those injured due to the accident at #NTPC plant in Raebareli.
UP Principal Secretary (Home) Arvind Kumar told reporters in Lucknow that the toll in the NTPC boiler blast has risen to 26.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi had said that he was "deeply pained" by the accident at the power plant.
TEXT:
ADVERTISEMENT

Even as the death toll in the massive explosion in NTPC's Unchahar plant in Uttar Pradesh's Rae Bareli district today rose to 26, survivors' account reveal the intensity of the blast.

"We were 80-90 metres away. The boiler started shaking and then there was a blast...gas exploded. Many fell unconscious," a survivor told NDTV.

While NTPC has initiated a probe into the blast, while Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath has announced Rs 2 lakh compensation for the families of those killed and Rs 50,000 for the grievously injured.

PTI reported that Congress vice president Rahul Gandhi has taken a break from his ongoing 'Navsarjan Yatra' in poll-bound Gujarat and is visiting Rae Bareli, which is the constituency of his mother Sonia Gandhi.

He is expected to meet the family of the victims of the blast.

#WATCH Congress Vice President Rahul Gandhi reaches Rae Bareli district hospital to meet those injured in #NTPCExplosion. pic.twitter.com/9hiEjpmkwr November 2, 2017

The PTI report said that Sonia Gandhi has expressed shock at the "terrible tragedy".

Meanwhile, PM Narendra Modi has Rs. 50,000 each for those injured and ex- gratia of Rs 2 lakh each for next of kin of those who have lost their lives.

PM Narendra Modi also approves Rs. 50,000 each for those injured due to the accident at #NTPC plant in Raebareli. ‚Äî ANI (@ANI) November 2, 2017

While Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath is abroad, Deputy Chief Minister Dinesh Sharma will be visiting Rae Bareli today, reported PTI.

UP Principal Secretary (Home) Arvind Kumar told reporters in Lucknow that the toll in the NTPC boiler blast has risen to 26.

In a statement, the National Thermal Power Corporation (NTPC) has said that at unit number six of its Unchahar plant, there was a sudden abnormal sound at 20-meter elevation around 3:30 yesterday afternoon.

There was an opening in corner number two from which gases and steam "escaped" affecting the people working around the area, the central public sector undertaking said.

It added that around 80 people were rushed to the NTPC Hospital, most of whom were discharged after first-aid.

The 1,550-MW plant supplies electricity to nine states, according to officials, and employs around 870 people.

Prime Minister Narendra Modi had said that he was "deeply pained" by the accident at the power plant.

Union Power Minister R K Singh, through social media posts, expressed deep anguish at the loss of lives and said that he had directed NTPC Chairman and Managing Director Gurdeep Singh to rush to the site.

(with PTI inputs)
TITLE: The Boiler Started Shaking And Then There Was A Blast, Survivor Describes NTPC Explosion As Death Toll Rises To 26

TEXT:
La segunda edici√≥n de Masterchef Celebrity se encuentra ya en su recta final y, aunque la tensi√≥n crece entre los concursantes, no cierran la puerta a nuevos aspirantes. Este fue el caso del actor Francis Lorenzo, que compiti√≥ en la prueba de exteriores del √∫ltimo programa, ya que Silvia Abril no pudo participar por problemas de salud.

"Aunque ella es fuerte y luchadora, se ha puesto enferma y no est√° en condiciones de competir hoy", cont√≥ Eva Gonz√°lez nada m√°s presentar la segunda prueba del programa. A continuaci√≥n present√≥ al que ser√≠a el sustituto de la humorista, que tendr√≠a la responsabilidad de salvarla o mandarla a la prueba de eliminaci√≥n con la actuaci√≥n de su equipo. Un hecho in√©dito en las distintas ediciones de Masterchef.

En un principio, Lorenzo participar√≠a con Anabel Alonso ‚Äîya nominada para la prueba de eliminaci√≥n‚Äî y Edu Soto, pero el jurado decidi√≥ cambiar las formaciones y que Lorenzo se cambiase con Sa√∫l Craviotto. De esta manera, el actor pas√≥ al equipo de Jos√© Corbacho y Patricia Montero, y Craviotto compiti√≥ junto a Alonso y Soto.

El nuevo concursante, al ser gallego y la prueba de exteriores en la Ribiera Sacra (Orense), fue gratamente recibido por sus compa√±eros. Primero por parte de Anabel Alonso y despu√©s por Patricia Montero, ambas justificando su agrado porque "sabe lo que se cuece en Galicia". Por su parte, Lorenzo declar√≥ antes de comenzar que estaba "entre asustado y muy asustado".

La nueva incorporaci√≥n caus√≥ cierta confusi√≥n entre el p√∫blico que, si se hab√≠a perdido parte del concurso, no entend√≠a d√≥nde estaba Silvia Abril y por qu√© estaba Francis Lorenzo en el programa.

Llego tarde... qu√© hace Francis Lorenzo en #MCCelebrity??? ‚Äî CrisBt (@Criskorne) 7 de noviembre de 2017

#MCCelebrity

Alguien que me cuente donde est√° Silvia y por que est√° Francis please ‚Äî karmen karmeta (@karmenkarmeta) 7 de noviembre de 2017

#MCCelebrity acabo de llegar a casa. Que alguien me ponga al d√≠a. Que hace Francis Lorenzo ah√≠? ‚Äî icomontes (@icomontes) 7 de noviembre de 2017

Sin embargo, conforme se fue desarrollando la prueba, los halagos se sucedieron por parte de sus compa√±eros, del jurado e incluso de los usuarios de Twitter.

Poca broma con Francis, en 10 min le he visto m√°s nivel que a media edici√≥n de este a√±o #MCCelebrity ‚Äî Dani Parada Martinez (@danielo___) 7 de noviembre de 2017

#MCCelebrity

Sorprendentemente Francis Lorenzo uno de los mejores aspirantes invitados que he visto pic.twitter.com/6yvHaUuHET ‚Äî Ivanote (@supermanix17) 7 de noviembre de 2017

Y yo al que veo mejor de todo es a Francis Lorenzo porque anima al equipo, sobre todo a Jose, est√° en todos lados, est√° muy seguro de s√≠ mismo en todo lo que est√° haciendo, sobre todo cortando las cosas con el cuchillo y con la masa. El comisario Hern√°n viene fuerte #MCCelebrity ‚Äî David (@DavidCS1990) 7 de noviembre de 2017

A pesar del buen cocinado del actor, este no pudo evitar que su equipo ‚Äîy, por tanto, tambi√©n Silvia Abril‚Äî acabara vistiendo el delantal negro de la eliminaci√≥n. "Me he sentido un poco asustado, ves la responsabilidad que tienen y que ellos se la est√°n jugando. Estoy muy satisfecho", confes√≥ Lorenzo antes de recibir el veredicto del jurado.

La buena actitud del nuevo participante llev√≥ a que desde el jurado le animasen a participar en la pr√≥xima edici√≥n del programa. "Yo que t√∫ me empezar√≠a a plantear formar parte de la tercera edici√≥n. Tienes potencial de sobra", le motiv√≥ Pepe Rodr√≠guez. A pesar de esto, parec√≠a que formar parte del reality no entraba inicialmente en sus planes: "No me lo hab√≠a pensado, pero visto la experiencia...".

Sin embargo, esta no era la primera vez que el actor aparec√≠a en el programa. El pasado 17 de octubre, Lorenzo se encontraba entre los famosos que degustaron los platos de los concursantes. Entonces, incluso se atrevi√≥ a decir que le faltaba "un poquito de sal" al plato en cuesti√≥n. ¬øSe imaginar√≠a unos programas despu√©s entre los fogones?

El actor Francis Lorenzo junto a la actriz Marta Belaustegui en el programa 5 de 'Masterchef Celebrity'.

Desde luego que, comprobada la fijaci√≥n de Masterchef con el actor y la muestra de sus habilidades culinarias, no nos extra√±ar√≠a que estuviese en la tercera edici√≥n del programa.

La √∫ltima entrega de Masterchef Celebrity sigui√≥ cosechando buenos datos de audiencia con 2,8 millones de espectadores y un 23,5% de cuota de pantalla.
TITLE: 'Masterchef Celebrity' introduce un nuevo concursante en el programa antes de la semifinal

TEXT:
Die Paradise Papers zeigen einen weiteren Steuertrick von US-Megakonzern Apple

So waren ab 2015 zwei Apple-Sitze auf der Insel Jersey registriert

Dort liegt der Steuersatz f√ºr Unternehmen bei null Prozent

Die Paradise Papers zeigen Apples neuen Steuertrick. Der US-Konzern wollte sich im Fr√ºhjahr 2014 zusichern lassen, auf der Steueroase Jersey keinerlei Steuern zahlen zu m√ºssen.

"Ist es m√∂glich, eine offizielle Best√§tigung der Steuerbefreiung zu bekommen, und kostet das etwas?", lie√ü Apple √ºber eine amerikanische Anwaltskanzlei bei dem Offshore-Dienstleister Appleby nachfragen, bevor Tochterfirmen Gesch√§ftssitze auf die Insel verlagerten.

Irland-Gesellschaften von Apple nutzten eine L√ºcke im irischen Steuerrecht. Diese erm√∂glichte es ihnen, in keinem Land der Welt Steuern zahlen zu m√ºssen. Die L√ºcke wurde 2015 auf internationalen Druck hin geschlossen.

Danach f√ºhrte Appleby laut den Dokumenten zwei irische Apple-Firmen mit Gesch√§ftssitz auf der √Ñrmelkanal-Insel Jersey, zeigen die Paradise Papers, die der "S√ºddeutschen Zeitung" zugespielt wurden. Auf Jersey liegt der Steuersatz f√ºr Unternehmen bei null Prozent. Auf diese Weise dr√ºckte der Konzern seine Steuerquote bei Gewinnen au√üerhalb der USA weiter auf nur drei bis sieben Prozent.

‚û® Mehr zum Thema: Liebe Eliten, wundert euch nicht, wenn die Menschen AfD w√§hlen, es liegt auch an eurem Verhalten

Apple betonte, sich an alle Gesetze zu halten. "Wir sind der gr√∂√üte Steuerzahler der Welt", sagte ein Sprecher.

Auch Nike arbeitet mit Offshore-Firmen

Auch der Sportartikelkonzern Nike nutzt ein Steuerschlupfloch. Der Sportartikelhersteller gr√ºndete zuerst zahlreiche Offshore-Firmen auf den Bermudas, um dort die Lizenzrechte der Firma zu halten - etwa f√ºr das Firmenlogo, den weltber√ºhmten "Swoosh".

An diese Briefkastenfirmen mussten Nike-Niederlassungen Hunderte Millionen Euro bezahlen, um die Markenrechte nutzen zu d√ºrfen.

Durch die hohen Lizenzzahlungen wurden die weltweiten Gewinne drastisch gedr√ºckt und damit die Steuerlast. Nike verlagerte laut den Paradise Papers 2014 diese Praxis in die europ√§ische Steueroase Niederlande - und dr√ºckte seine globale Steuerrate damit von 35 Prozent um das Jahr 2002 auf nur mehr rund 13 Prozent. So konnte Nike in Steueroasen Gewinne in H√∂he von mehr als zw√∂lf Milliarden Dollar anh√§ufen, die kaum besteuert wurden.

Auch mehrere Deutsche tauchen in den Dokumenten auf. Darunter Altkanzler Gerhard Schr√∂der und Gl√ºcksspiel-Unternehmer Paul Gauselmann.
TITLE: "Kostet das etwas?" Paradise Papers decken auf, wie dreist Apple bei den Steuern trickst

TEXT:
Syria took a break on Tuesday from its gruesome six-year civil war to announce plans to sign the Paris climate agreement, leaving the United States as the only country to reject the emissions-cutting deal.

The announcement came at the 23rd Conference of the Parties in Bonn, Germany, the world‚Äôs biggest climate conference. The non-binding Paris accord, through which signatories pledge to reduce emissions of planet-warming gases over the coming decades, was brokered in 2015, when the annual conference was held in the French capital.

The deal was considered historic because it was the first climate agreement to include the U.S. ‚Äï the world‚Äôs biggest historic emitter, with by far the largest per-capita carbon footprint ‚Äï and China, which currently produces the most carbon pollution on a national level. The U.S. took a lead role in shaping the deal.

Only war-torn Syria and Nicaragua, which protested the agreement‚Äôs failure to impose strict demands on major polluters, refused to sign.

But President Donald Trump, who rejects scientists‚Äô warnings about climate change, announced plans to withdraw from the pact in June, insisting developing nations received more benefits and the U.S. got none. In his announcement ‚Äï which, under the terms of the deal, fully can‚Äôt go into effect until November 2020 ‚Äï Trump seemed to conflate the accord with a trade deal, demonstrating what was widely described as a poor understanding of how the Paris agreement actually works.

‚ÄúLike the playground bully that eventually loses all his friends, Donald Trump has isolated himself on the world stage,‚Äù Joe Ware, a spokesman for the charity Christian Aid, said in a statement. ‚ÄúWhen even Syria, with all its problems, can see the sense of a global climate agreement it really shows how ideologically wedded to climate denialism the US Republican Party has become.‚Äù
TITLE: Syria Vows To Sign Paris Agreement, Leaving U.S. Alone In Climate Denial

TEXT:
Weary of simple pop music spats, Taylor Swift now has a new feuding partner: the ACLU.

The singer has landed in the watchdog organization's crosshairs after her lawyer sent an intimidating letter to the website PopFront regarding a recent article about Swift's popularity among white supremacists.

In a piece titled, "Swiftly to the alt-right: Taylor subtly gets the lower case kkk in formation," writer Meghan Herning argues that Swift's new single "Look What You Made Me Do" serves as a "subtle, quiet white support of a racial hierarchy" by positioning the singer alongside the history of the eugenics movement and the rise of neo-Nazis.

William J. Briggs, a lawyer representing Swift, wrote in a letter to Herning that her PopFront article is a "provably false and defamatory story" that will result in a lawsuit if the website refuses to issue a retraction or take down the post.

"It appears to be a malicious attack against Ms. Swift that goes to great lengths to portray Ms. Swift as some sort of white supremacist figurehead, which is a baseless fiction masquerading as fact and completely misrepresents Ms. Swift," Briggs wrote.

The letter also defends Swift's political silence in the last presidential election as a personal choice, as she has "no obligation to campaign for any particular political candidate or broadcast her political views."

Herning shared the letter with the ACLU, which is now defending the blogger against any legal threats against her, calling Briggs' claims "meritless." In the eyes of the organization, the article is a "mix of political speech and critical commentary" that falls within the protections of the First Amendment.

"This is a completely unsupported attempt to suppress constitutionally protected speech," Michael Risher, an attorney for ACLU of Northern California, said in a press release.

"Intimidation tactics like these are unacceptable," Matt Cagle, another attorney with the organization, added. "Not in her wildest dreams can Ms. Swift use copyright law to suppress this exposure of a threat to constitutionally protected speech."

Swift has taken legal action against claims of this nature before. The singer has been heralded as a white supremacist hero in the dark corners of the internet by those who've described the pop star as an "Aryan goddess." (Breitbart, a website that has offered a platform for alt-right views, tweeting out the lyrics to her new single certainly didn't help.)

Swift has yet to respond to the ACLU's letter, as well as HuffPost's request for comment.
TITLE: ACLU Drags Taylor Swift For Trying To Silence Critic

SUMMARY:
Was f√ºr ein Hohn f√ºr die Opfer von Stasi & Co., von denen immer noch viele gerade in Berlin leben.
Der Terror der Kommunisten gegen ihre eigenen V√∂lker, die Millionen Opfer ‚Äì all das ist im Bewusstsein vieler Menschen in Deutschland (und anderswo) nicht (mehr) verankert.
Als die frisch gew√§hlte Verfassungsgebende Versammlung im Januar die Erlasse Lenins f√ºr illegal erkl√§rte, lie√ü dieser sie einfach aufl√∂sen ‚Äì und auf Demonstranten schie√üen, die f√ºr ihre gew√§hlten Vertreter auf die Stra√üe gingen.
Wie selbstverst√§ndlich beteiligt sich die "Linke" aktiv am "Kampf gegen Rechts" - so als drohe eine Gefahr f√ºr die Demokratie nur aus dieser Richtung.
Teile unserer Medien und Politik reagierten mit Feindseligkeiten gegen die Polizei und manchmal kaum verhohlenem Verst√§ndnis f√ºr die Gewaltt√§ter.
TEXT:
Viele Deutsche hegen Sympathien f√ºr die russischen Kommunisten

Dabei blenden sie deren Verbrechen aus

Auch Medien vermitteln teilweise ein falsches Bild der "Oktoberrevolution"

W√ºrde ein √∂ffentlich-rechtlicher Sender in Deutschland die Machtergreifung von Mussolini und seinen Faschisten in Italien feiern? Den Ausbruch des Ersten Weltkriegs? Oder den Jahrestag eines Putsches in S√ºdamerika?

Aus guten Gr√ºnden k√§me sicher kein Redakteur jemals auf so eine Idee.

Ganz anders, wenn es um den Kommunismus geht.

Der √∂ffentlich-rechtliche, deutsch-franz√∂sische Sender Arte k√ºndigte auf seiner Facebook-Seite an, er werde die russische "Oktoberrevolution", die sich am 7. November zum 100. Mal j√§hrt, mit zahlreichen Beitr√§gen "feiern".

Alles spricht daf√ºr, dass es sich bei der Formulierung nur um den Missgriff eines einzelnen Mitarbeiters handelt ‚Äì denn die Sendungen selbst, die Arte zur Oktoberrevolution sendete, waren kritisch und wurden dem tragischen Ereignis durchaus gerecht.

Sympathie f√ºr Lenins Putsch

Aber es ist kein Zufall, dass sich ein Journalist so vergaloppieren konnte. Und dass der Post mit dem "feiern" tagelang online blieb ‚Äì und erst nach Berichten dar√ºber in den sozialen Netzwerken kommentarlos von der Seite verschwand.

Der verbale Missgriff auf der Arte-Seite ist ein Symptom ‚Äì und auch nur deshalb der Erw√§hnung wert: Bis hinein in weite Teile der politischen Elite in Deutschland herrscht heute noch eine, zuweilen klammheimliche, zuweilen offene Sympathie f√ºr Lenins Putsch, der zu den gr√∂√üten Trag√∂dien des 21. Jahrhunderts geh√∂rt.

In Berlin, Hamburg und Bremen gab es Umz√ºge zur Feier der Revolution; mitsamt sowjetischem Panzer und Attrappen des Panzerkreuzers Aurora feierten Kommunisten ausgelassen die Macht√ºbernahme durch Lenin und seine Komplizen. Was f√ºr ein Hohn f√ºr die Opfer von Stasi & Co., von denen immer noch viele gerade in Berlin leben.

Was in Berlin yesterday at Brandenburger Tor just as October Revolution being celebrated pic.twitter.com/mkWydX9Mv6 ‚Äî Claire McDonald (@ClaireEMcDonald) 7. November 2017

Gr√§uel Stalins werden ignoriert

Dass der Kommunismus ein schrecklicher Irrweg der Geschichte war ‚Äì dar√ºber herrscht kein grundlegender, √ºber alle politischen Lager gehenden Konsens, wie wir ihn beim Faschismus haben.

G√§be es diesen Konsens, w√§ren verbale Entgleisungen wie das "feiern" der Oktoberrevolution ein Tabu. Und so w√ºrden zumindest so schnell wieder von der Seite eines √∂ffentlich-rechtlichen Senders verschwinden wie sie dort ver√∂ffentlicht wurden.

Viele haben die Lehre des gro√üen Sozialdemokraten Kurt Schumacher vergessen, wonach die Kommunisten (unter Stalin) nichts anderes als "rot lackierte Nazis" seien. Vergessen ist auch, dass Stalin nach Kriegsende seine Gegner, darunter auch Sozialdemokraten, wieder in den alten, von ihm wieder er√∂ffneten Konzentrationslagern der Nazis einsperren lie√ü.

Schumachers Urteil zeigt, wie zynisch die in Deutschland immer noch weit verbreitete Unsitte ist, die unglaublichen Verbrechen von Hitler und seinem Regime zu instrumentalisieren, um Stalin und Lenin zu relativieren und verharmlosen.

Falsche Berichte √ºber die Revolution

Wer Diktatur und Massenmord durch den Vergleich mit Hitler sch√∂nredet, verh√∂hnt auf unertr√§gliche Weise die Opfer.

Der Terror der Kommunisten gegen ihre eigenen V√∂lker, die Millionen Opfer ‚Äì all das ist im Bewusstsein vieler Menschen in Deutschland (und anderswo) nicht (mehr) verankert. Die Ursache daf√ºr liegt teilweise schon im Schulunterricht.

Selbst in den Medien sind die Wissensl√ºcken zum Teil gewaltig: So schrieb eine gro√üe deutsche Tageszeitung dieser Tage, Lenin habe 1917 den Zaren gest√ºrzt und die Monarchie in Russland beendet.

Genau das war aber schon im Februar 1917 geschehen, bei der Februar-Revolution, als Lenin noch im Ausland war. Die damals entstandene provisorische Regierung wollte Russland zu einer Demokratie machen.

Die "Oktoberrevolution" war ein klassischer Putsch

In den USA ist die Lage nicht besser. Ein Drittel der jungen Amerikaner glaubt laut einer Umfrage des Instituts YouGov von 2016, dass unter Stalin weniger Menschen get√∂tet wurden als unter George W. Bush.

Die Verkl√§rung der Ereignisse vom 7. November (nach dem damals in Russland g√ºltigen Kalender war es der 25. Oktober) zeigt sich schon darin, wie wir sie nennen: Unter Revolution verstehen wir heutzutage zumeist eine radikale Ver√§nderung der Verh√§ltnisse, die von unten ausgeht, also von den Menschen.

Dass Lenin am 7. November 1917 die Minister der Provisorischen Regierung festnehmen lie√ü, war ein klassischer Putsch. Treffender w√§re also der Begriff "Oktober-Putsch" statt "Oktober-Revolution".

Auch in der fr√ºhen Sowjetunion wurde das Wort "Revolution" nicht gebraucht. Erst Stalin f√ºhrte es in den 1920er Jahren ein, wie der russische Philosoph Igor Tschubais betont.

Lenin l√§sst Gegner erschie√üen

Auch den legend√§ren "Sturm auf den Winterpalast" in Sankt Petersburg hat es demzufolge nie gegeben ‚Äì die Wachen lie√üen Lenins Handvoll K√§mpfer kampflos und unspektakul√§r in das Geb√§ude.

Bei den freien Wahlen im November 1917 erhielten Lenins Bolschewiken nur rund 25 Prozent.

Als die frisch gew√§hlte Verfassungsgebende Versammlung im Januar die Erlasse Lenins f√ºr illegal erkl√§rte, lie√ü dieser sie einfach aufl√∂sen ‚Äì und auf Demonstranten schie√üen, die f√ºr ihre gew√§hlten Vertreter auf die Stra√üe gingen. Lenins Schwergen t√∂teten mehr als hundert Menschen.

Nicht mehr als ein Tropfen in dem Meer von Blut, dass die Bolschewiken sp√§ter anrichteten.

Putin h√§lt Lenin f√ºr einen Verr√§ter

Selbst Wladimir Putin, sonst Sowjet-Nostalgiker, h√§lt sich auffallend zur√ºck, was Lenin und die Oktoberrevolution angeht.

Mehr noch: Der heutige russische Pr√§sident warf Lenin vor, er habe eine Atombombe unter den russischen Staat gelegt.

"Putin setzt ganz offensichtlich gro√üe St√ºcke auf Stalin, aber nicht auf Lenin", glaubt der Philosoph Tschubais: "Lenin h√§lt er zurecht f√ºr einen Verr√§ter, der im Auftrag der damaligen deutschen Regierung handelte."

Diese Version der Geschichte ist in Moskau derzeit weit verbreitet: Der gro√üe Revolutionsheld als eine Marionette der Obersten Heeresf√ºhrung in Berlin, die mit seiner Hilfe den Kriegsgegner Russland schw√§chen wollte. Und tats√§chlich war einer der ersten Erlasse Lenins, einen Tag nach seiner Machtergreifung, die Kapitulation Russlands, auf die Kaiser Wilhelm II. in Berlin gehofft hatte.

An den Folgen der "Oktoberrevolution" leidet Russland bis heute

Stalin dagegen ist in den Augen von Putin und der KGB-M√§nner aus seinem Umfeld der Retter ihres Vaterlands im Zweiten Weltkrieg. Wobei sie geflissentlich ausblenden, dass ihr Idol in diesem zwei Jahre lang auf der falschen Seite k√§mpfte und als Komplize Hitlers zahlreiche L√§nder √ºberfiel und besetzte.

All das betrachten Putin und seine Gef√§hrten ebenso wie den Terror als "Kollateralschaden" auf dem Weg zum Sieg.

Massenterror gegen die eigene Bev√∂lkerung, bei dem jeder zu jeder Zeit willk√ºrlich Opfer werden konnte, der GULAG, der Hunger-Terror gegen das eigene Volk, Abermillionen Toter ‚Äì das sind nur die schlimmsten Folgen der ‚ÄûOktoberrevolution‚Äú. Die Liste der Verbrechen und verheerenden Folgen des bolschewistischen Umsturzes lie√üe sich schier endlos fortsetzen.

Lenin setzte explizit das Recht au√üer Kraft, auch das V√∂lkerrecht.

An den Folgen der "Oktoberrevolution" leidet Russland bis heute

An den Folgen leidet Russland bis heute. Selbst der Putin-Intimus Dmitrij Medwedew beklagte, im Land herrsche Rechtsnihilismus ‚Äì freilich ohne auf dessen Wurzeln hinzuweisen.

Stalin beging V√∂lkermord am eigenen Volk, schreibt der Philosoph Tschubais.

Man m√ºsste wohl hinzuf√ºgen, dass er auch das Bewusstsein seines Volkes massiv besch√§digte. Er pervertierte die Moral, normalisierte die L√ºge, versuchte, die Geschichte auszuradieren. Und er pflanzte den Verfolgungswahn tief im Bewusstsein der politischen Elite ein.

All das tat er im Namen des "Guten".

Die Schrecken des Kommunismus werden in Moskau heute allenfalls beil√§ufig erw√§hnt. In Russland denken laut Umfragen heute 46 Prozent der Menschen positiv √ºber Stalin. Als unentschuldbares Verbrechen betrachten seinen Terror gegen die eigenen B√ºrger nur noch 39 Prozent.

Putins Propaganda wirkt.

Warum gibt es in Deutschland eine solche Sympathie f√ºr den Kommunismus?

Umso erstaunlicher ist es aber, dass auch im Westen noch so viel Sympathie f√ºr das sowjetische System herrsct.

Die Begeisterung f√ºr Stalin bei westlichen Intellektuellen wie Jean-Paul Sartre oder Lion Feuchtwanger, die seine Verbrechen besch√∂nigten und so zu Komplizen wurde, ist nie richtig aufgearbeitet worden.

Dies ist wohl einer der Gr√ºnde daf√ºr, warum Verteidiger von Putin wie Altkanzler Gerhard Schr√∂der oder die Ex-ARD-Korrespondentin Gabriele Krone-Schmalz heute noch auf relativ gro√üe Zustimmung bei Russlandfreunden in Deutschland sto√üen.

Die Methoden, die Putins Helfer nutzen, erinnern an die von Stalins ausl√§ndischen Unterst√ºtzern: Kritik an dem Herrscher im Kreml wurde gleichgesetzt mit Kritik am Land. Der Hinweis auf Missst√§nde wurde als "antikommunistische Hetze" (heute: "D√§monisierung") und "√ºberdrehte Medienkampagne" hingestellt, mit denen der Westen von den eigenen Verbrechen ablenken wolle.

Wagenknecht hat sich nie von Stalins Verbrechen distanziert

Besonders unerkl√§rlich sind die Sympathien f√ºr den Kommunismus in Deutschland, das unter der Teilung, der Berliner Mauer und der Unterdr√ºckung durch Stalin und seine Schergen viel st√§rker litt als seine westlichen Nachbarn.

Mit der "Linken" ist heute die umbenannte SED so gut wie in der politischen Mitte Deutschlands angekommen. Stalins politische Ur-Enkel haben sich nie √ºberzeugend von der DDR distanziert. Doch das scheint viele nicht zu st√∂ren in Deutschland.

Wie selbstverst√§ndlich beteiligt sich die "Linke" aktiv am "Kampf gegen Rechts" - so als drohe eine Gefahr f√ºr die Demokratie nur aus dieser Richtung.

Sahra Wagenknecht ist gern gesehener Gast in Talkshows und mitten in der Gesellschaft angekommen ‚Äì eine Frau, die sich nie √ºberzeugend von ihrer fr√ºheren Sympathie f√ºr den Massenm√∂rder Stalin distanziert hat.

F√ºr wie selbstverst√§ndlich wir inzwischen die weit verbreitete Sehschw√§che auf dem linken Auge halten, zeigt die Reaktion auf die massive linke Gewalt beim G20-Gipfel in Hamburg diesen Sommer. Teile unserer Medien und Politik reagierten mit Feindseligkeiten gegen die Polizei und manchmal kaum verhohlenem Verst√§ndnis f√ºr die Gewaltt√§ter.

Die Lehren der Geschichte

Wer Gewalt anwende, sei kein Linker, weil Linke ja gegen Gewalt seien ‚Äì so ein damals weit verbreitetes Credo, das sich auch SPD-Vize Stegner zu eigen machte.

Im "Spiegel" war gar sinngem√§√ü zu lesen, linker gewaltbereiter Extremismus sei nicht mit rechtem gewaltbereiten Extremismus zu vergleichen, weil ersterer ja guten Zwecken diene und letzterer nicht.

Wer so argumentiert, hat aus der Geschichte nichts gelernt. Und zeigt ein fast schon infantiles Schwarz-Wei√ü-Denken.

Gerade sollten wir uns wieder die Lehren der Geschichte bewusstmachen: Wo immer sich Machthaber, mit welcher Begr√ºndung auch immer, √ºber das Gesetz stellen, wo immer staatliche Gewalt missbraucht wird, um Andersdenkende zu unterdr√ºcken, m√ºssen wir das nicht nur verurteilen ‚Äì sondern alles in unserer Macht Stehende dagegen tun.

Wer auch immer Demokratie, Freiheit und Rechtsstaat in Frage stellt, verdient keine Sympathie, sondern unseren entschiedenen Widerstand. Ganz egal, aus welcher politischen Ecke er kommt. Und welche angeblich hehren Ziele er als Begr√ºndung nennt. Die Geschichte zeigt: Das B√∂se ist immer dann besonders gef√§hrlich, wenn es im Gewand des Guten daherkommt.

(ben)
TITLE: Wie Medien und Linke in Deutschland die Herrschaft der russischen Kommunisten verherrlichen

SUMMARY:
ADVERTISEMENTEvery time a film presents different versions of the same story, the film critics can't help but compare it to Akira Kurosawa's Rashomon (1950).
However, his account of what actually happened that night completely differs from the account of the dead lawyer's wife.
Now, all those who have compared Ittefaq with Rashomon are clearly missing the point.
(2015) would hold up well on subsequent viewings, an average film like Ittefaq will most likely struggle to hold the viewer's attention during a second or a third viewing.
Ittefaq offers promise to begin with but ultimately it fails to leave any lasting impact.
TEXT:
ADVERTISEMENT

Every time a film presents different versions of the same story, the film critics can't help but compare it to Akira Kurosawa's Rashomon (1950). A couple of examples that come to mind are Rakhi Gulzar's Talvar (2015) and Sudhir Mishra's Inkaar (2013). In Abhay Chopra's Ittefaq, a remake of the 1969 film of the same name, we learn that a famous author is charged for committing two murders on the same night: his wife, and a lawyer whose house he accidentally breaks into while trying to escape.

Throughout the interrogation, the author maintains that he is innocent. However, his account of what actually happened that night completely differs from the account of the dead lawyer's wife. Now, all those who have compared Ittefaq with Rashomon are clearly missing the point. The fact of the matter is that in Rashomon, Kurosawa never makes an attempt to lead the viewer. He merely shows us the same event from four different points of view. Rashomon doesn't feed us with lies, only the different faces of truth. Ittefaq, on the other hands, keeps feeding us with lies. Alas, even the lies are not good enough to be deemed believable!

When a Rohit Shetty no-brainer like Golmaal Again (2017) tells you "Iss Diwali Logic Nahin Sirf Magic", you can perhaps afford to suspend logic but when a murder mystery expects you to forget logic then you just can't help but question the competency of the makers.

When a Rohit Shetty no-brainer like "Golmaal Again" (2017) tells you "Iss Diwali Logic Nahin Sirf Magic", you can perhaps afford to suspend logic but when a murder mystery expects you to forget logic then you just can't help but question the competency of the makers. Now, Ittefaq has been described as smart and gripping by some. While the film is certainly gripping for the most part, calling it smart would be a grave misjudgment. In Ittefaq's big reveal towards the end, the killer, minutes before boarding an international flight, confesses to the investigating officer during a telephonic conversation and offers a detailed account of the chain of events leading to the crime.

The officer is so thrilled to hear the killer's exhilarating account that he just doesn't seem interested in exercising the protocol needed to prevent the airplane from taking off. If that's not difficult enough to digest then just imagine how the police, during the course of investigation, can't figure out that the author's wife happened to be a client of the lawyer's. Isn't this connection the key to solving the two murders? How come an investigating officer who is smart enough to trace the hidden murder weapon is unable to figure out this basic fact? The film very conveniently tries to mislead us for nearly two hours, only to set us up for one lofty final twist in the vein of The Usual Suspects, merely adding insult to injury.

"When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth."

Whenever one speaks of crime and investigation a reference to Sir Authur Conan Doyle's Sherlock Holmes is inevitable. "When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth," says the super-sleuth in the short story titled "The Adventure of the Blanched Soldier" (1926). Ittefaq fails to pay any heed to this basic science of deduction . The end result is an average whodunit that seems to have little regard for the viewer's intelligence. Another time tested tool to assess suspense thrillers is to watch them a second or a third time. While films like "Murder on the Orient Express" (2017), " Gone Girl " (2014), "Teesri Manzil" (1966), "Manorama Six Feet Under" (2007) and " Detective Byomkesh Bakshy! " (2015) would hold up well on subsequent viewings, an average film like Ittefaq will most likely struggle to hold the viewer's attention during a second or a third viewing. In comparison to the remake, the original, directed by Yash Chopra, is more than capable of holding the viewer's attention on subsequent viewings, even after all these years.

Usually it's the movie's plot and performances that can make it worthy of subsequent viewings. The editing, direction, cinematography and background score can of course immen sely add to the overall experience. Take the case of Shekhar Kapoor and Karan Razdan-directed detective television series "Tehkikaat" which used to air on Doordarshan during the mid-90s. While the performances were a wee bit melodramatic and the plots often lacked the brilliance of a Sherlock Holmes or a Byomkesh Bakshi, the chilling background score and the camerawork added a different layer of mystery.

It's a bit perplexing to think why the makers, especially given its co-produced by Dharma Productions, Red Chillies Entertainment, and B.R. Studios, didn't focus on at least getting a strong background score in place? With the exception of Akshaye Khanna, Ittefaq is also quite average on the acting front. While Sonakshi Sinha has her moments in the movie, Sidharth Malhotra looks a bit flat. But he alone can't be blamed for it, for an average part requires an above-average actor. Given his limitations as a performer, Sidharth seems to have tried his best but unfortunately on this occasion his best just doesn't turn out to be good enough. Ittefaq offers promise to begin with but ultimately it fails to leave any lasting impact. The film can serve as a decent way to spend your free time when you have nothing better to indulge in and that too only as long as you can do away with any logical thinking.

Rating: D
TITLE: 'Ittefaq': A Weak Whodunit That Fails To Leave A Lasting Impact

SUMMARY:
Pallettoni che avrebbero abbattuto una mandria di bisonti ma non lui, che non pi√π 36 ore fa esultava per la vittoria di Musumeci in Sicilia, per il rinnovato peso politico e il futuro roseo per la coalizione di centrodestra che si accinge a guidare per la settima volta consecutiva alle elezioni politiche.
Le ultime che vinse furono quelle del 2008 contro Veltroni, all'epoca rampantissimo sindaco di Roma e segretario del neocostituito Partito democratico.
Forse s√¨, perch√© il nuovismo non sempre √® sinonimo di qualit√†, anzi!
Sarebbe bastato adeguare alla fotografia uscita dalle urne, che punirono ali estreme e frammenti riottosi di movimentucoli, una legge elettorale decente e magari, perch√© no?
Invenzioni meritorie, ma di cui si √® fatto un uso ormai intollerabile.
TEXT:
Sei anni fa, proprio in questi giorni, Silvio Berlusconi si accingeva a rassegnare le sue dimissioni da Presidente del Consiglio nella mani di Giorgio Napolitano, che aveva gi√† ordinato a Mario Monti di scaldarsi per subentrare al Cavaliere. Due anni dopo sarebbe arrivata la condanna definitiva con la conseguente perdita dello scranno a Palazzo Madama. Pallettoni che avrebbero abbattuto una mandria di bisonti ma non lui, che non pi√π 36 ore fa esultava per la vittoria di Musumeci in Sicilia, per il rinnovato peso politico e il futuro roseo per la coalizione di centrodestra che si accinge a guidare per la settima volta consecutiva alle elezioni politiche.

Le ultime che vinse furono quelle del 2008 contro Veltroni, all'epoca rampantissimo sindaco di Roma e segretario del neocostituito Partito democratico. Da qualche settimana Walter, che non √® pi√π parlamentare dal 2013, √® tornato sotto i riflettori: applauditissimo durante l'intervento per i 10 anni del Pd, cos√¨ come alla prima teatrale di "Ciao", pi√®ce teatrale tratta dal suo omonimo romanzo narrante il dolore per il mancato rapporto con il padre, il grande Vittorio, scomparso quando egli aveva un anno, Walter √® tornato in tv per presentare un nuovo libro e inizia a essere invocato come guida per i democrat in alternativa a Renzi.

Uno scenario al momento lontano ma non fantascientifico, che vedrebbe confrontarsi nuovamente Berlusconi e Veltroni, con le lancette dell'orologio riportate indietro di 10 anni esatti; in politica un'era geologica, in cui infatti √® capitato di tutto. Si stava meglio quando si stava peggio? Forse s√¨, perch√© il nuovismo non sempre √® sinonimo di qualit√†, anzi!

Nel 2008 il quadro politico era pi√π semplice. Contestualmente al Pd, che accorpava le due grandi famiglie eredi del comunismo e del cattolicesimo di sinistra, era nato il Popolo della Libert√† che invece assemblava i moderati con i post missini. Due grandi partiti, due poli e un sistema che guardava, finalmente, al mondo anglosassone. Sarebbe bastato adeguare alla fotografia uscita dalle urne, che punirono ali estreme e frammenti riottosi di movimentucoli, una legge elettorale decente e magari, perch√© no? Anche investire finalmente sul presidenzialismo, per aumentare stabilit√† e governabilit√†.

Certo non era prevedibile una crescita cos√¨ repentina di un terzo polo come quello del Movimento 5 stelle, ma la XVI Legislatura resta un'occasione persa, anche perch√© il Pdl, che ottenne la pi√π grande maggioranza della storia repubblicana, invece fu il primo a sfarinare a causa delle ambizioni del suo cofondatore Gianfranco Fini. La strada intrapresa 10 anni fa dei due grandi partiti, uno progressista, l'altro moderato, era giusta e quel solco andava difeso con maggior vigoria, dagli stessi protagonisti che l'avevano ispirato. Il resto √® stato tutta una scissione, praticamente ovunque. Senza pi√π un'adesione ideologica i parlamentari hanno indossato pi√π casacche di Vieri e Ibrahimovic messi insieme, il dibattito interno ai partiti √® sempre sfociato in divorzi, che hanno alimentato altri partiti/movimenti facendo tornare il quadro un variegato patchwork con una governabilit√† sempre pi√π miraggio.

P.s. Nel 2008 si stava meglio anche perch√© in pochi avevano un profilo Facebook o Twitter. Invenzioni meritorie, ma di cui si √® fatto un uso ormai intollerabile.
TITLE: Il ritorno di Berlusconi e Veltroni. Perch√© quel 2008 non era affatto sbagliato

TEXT:
El Partido Dem√≥crata de Estados Unidos ha ganado este martes las gobernaciones de Virginia y Nueva Jersey, las dos √∫nicas en juego este a√±o, justo en la v√≠spera del primer aniversario de la victoria de Donald Trump en las elecciones presidenciales.

En Nueva Jersey, feudo de Chris Christie, uno de los principales asesores de Trump en su campa√±a hacia la presidencia del pa√≠s, el candidato dem√≥crata, Philip Murphy, ha arrebatado la gobernaci√≥n a los republicanos.

Christie es gobernador desde 2010, pero esta vez no se ha presentado porque no pod√≠a optar a un tercer mandato, as√≠ que Murphy se ha batido con la hasta ahora vicegobernadora del estado, Kim Guadagno. Con el 71% escrutado, Murphy ha obtenido el 55,6% de los votos, mientras que Guadagno ha logrado el 42,5%.

En Virgina, los dem√≥cratas han mantenido la gobernaci√≥n gracias a la victoria de su candidato, Ralph Northam, frente al republicano, Ed Gillespie.

Con el escrutinio casi completo (99%), Northam ha obtenido un 53,6% de los votos por un 45,2% de Gillespie, que se hab√≠a alejado de Trump para mostrar un perfil moderado en un estado en el que los dem√≥cratas se han ido fortaleciendo en las √∫ltimas d√©cadas.

Pese a ese distanciamiento, Gillespie ha protagonizado una campa√±a marcada por el rechazo a la inmigraci√≥n ilegal.

A trav√©s de Twitter, Trump, que est√° en Corea del Sur, ha reaccionado a la derrota de Gillespie: "Ed Gillespie trabaj√≥ duro pero no me abraz√≥ a m√≠ ni lo que yo defiendo". Pese a las derrota en Virginia y Nueva Jersey, Trump ha asegurado que los republicanos "seguir√°n ganando, incluso m√°s que antes".

Ed Gillespie worked hard but did not embrace me or what I stand for. Don't forget, Republicans won 4 out of 4 House seats, and with the economy doing record numbers, we will continue to win, even bigger than before!
TITLE: Golpe a Trump: los dem√≥cratas ganan en los dos estados en juego al a√±o de su victoria

MONTREAL ‚Äî The concept of "western alienation" is real and dangerous, and people in the region feel as though their aspirations aren't in line with those in the rest of Canada, Rona Ambrose said Tuesday.
She said one incident that recently provoked sentiments of alienation in Western Canada was the rejoicing of politicians in Quebec ‚Äî notably outgoing Montreal mayor Denis Coderre ‚Äî to news that TransCanada was abandoning its Energy East pipeline project.

TEXT:
Former interim Conservative leader Rona Ambrose is shown during an interview with The Canadian Press in Ottawa, on May 18, 2017.

MONTREAL ‚Äî The concept of "western alienation" is real and dangerous, and people in the region feel as though their aspirations aren't in line with those in the rest of Canada, Rona Ambrose said Tuesday.

"We have a population in Alberta feeling as though their goals aren't part of the federation's goals ‚Äî it's dangerous," the former interim Tory leader told an audience in Montreal as they celebrated the opening of a new school of public policy at McGill University.

She said one incident that recently provoked sentiments of alienation in Western Canada was the rejoicing of politicians in Quebec ‚Äî notably outgoing Montreal mayor Denis Coderre ‚Äî to news that TransCanada was abandoning its Energy East pipeline project.

She added the ill-fated plan to ship Alberta crude through Quebec to a port in New Brunswick for refining and sale overseas represented "hope" for Albertans, who have been suffering economically since the price of oil fell several years ago.

Former interim Conservative leader Rona Ambrose speaks during question period in the House of Commons on Parliament Hill in Ottawa on Dec. 6, 2016.

Ambrose cited opposition inside neighbouring British Columbia to the Kinder Morgan Trans Mountain pipeline expansion as another factor leading western Canadians to question their place in the country.

"Over a short time frame, (opposition to energy projects) has become a political issue on the ground," said Ambrose, who spent 13 years representing citizens in Alberta at the federal level and served as interim Conservative leader.

"It's getting easy to stir up feelings of alienation ‚Äî it's not good for the federation."

She said the idea that western Canadians, especially Albertans, are increasingly feeling out of place inside the vision of Canada put forward by the current federal government "is very real."

Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has been criticized for lacking enthusiasm for getting Canada's oil and gas resources to market.

The Conservatives blame Trudeau's government for the failure of Energy East while Ottawa says the company's decision to cancel the project was due to business considerations.

PM has westerners wondering if Canada values them: Wall

Hard feelings in Western Canada toward Ottawa were summed up recently by Saskatchewan Premier Brad Wall:

"(Trudeau's) actions and his government's actions may well have some westerners wondering if this country really values Western Canada, the resources we have, and the things we do to contribute to the national economy and to quality of life for all," he said.

Ambrose was among several prominent Canadians on hand to celebrate the opening of a school of public policy made possible by a $10-million donation by the Max Bell Foundation.

Former prime minister Paul Martin as well as Michael Sabia, president and CEO of the Caisse de depot et placement du Quebec, were among those who spoke at the event.

Ambrose retired from politics last summer and is now a Global Fellow for the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars, which is based in Washington, D.C.

Also On HuffPost:
TITLE: Rona Ambrose: 'Western Alienation' Is Real And It's Dangerous

La mort de l'√©crivain Milan Kundera a √©t√© annonc√©e ce mardi 7 novembre par un faux compte Twitter, "@GallimardNews", qui n'avait post√© que deux tweets √† la mi-journ√©e.
Les Editions Gallimard annoncent la mort de Milan Kundera.
"Milan Kundera est mort de rire... Je viens de parler avec lui: il d√©guste un bon Bordeaux", a-t-il √©crit sur son compte Twitter.
Fin ao√ªt, un faux compte Twitter avait annonc√©, √† tort, la mort de l'√©crivain japonais Haruki Murakami.
Pour ceux qui s'interrogent sur la mort √©ventuelle de Murakami, annonc√©e par @ShinchoshaBooks : c'est louche, et annonc√© nulle part ailleurs https://t.co/pVcQNiH6Zh ‚Äî Micha√´l Szadkowski (@szadkowski_m) 21 ao√ªt 2017√Ä voir √©galement sur Le HuffPost:
TEXT:
POLITIQUE - La fausse nouvelle n'a eu que quelques secondes pour se r√©pandre avant d'√™tre d√©mentie. La mort de l'√©crivain Milan Kundera a √©t√© annonc√©e ce mardi 7 novembre par un faux compte Twitter, "@GallimardNews", qui n'avait post√© que deux tweets √† la mi-journ√©e.

Les v√©ritables √©ditions Gallimard, dont le compte Twitter est en fait "@Gallimard", ont indiqu√© √† France Soir que cette information √©tait fausse et que l'√©crivain franco-tch√®que, auteur de L'insoutenable l√©g√®ret√© de l'√™tre, n'√©tait pas mort. Les suspicions de "fake news" avaient alors d√©j√† largement gagn√© Twitter, pas dupe de ce faux compte quasiment vide de toute autre information.

URGENT. Les Editions Gallimard annoncent la mort de Milan Kundera. ‚Äî Gallimard (@GallimardNews) 7 novembre 2017

L'√©crivain Christian Salmon, auteur de "Entretiens avec Milan Kundera", a r√©pondu avec humour aux rumeurs. "Milan Kundera est mort de rire... Je viens de parler avec lui: il d√©guste un bon Bordeaux", a-t-il √©crit sur son compte Twitter.

Milan #Kundera est mort de rire...

(en apprenant la nouvelle de sa mort sur Twitter)

Je viens de parler avec lui: il d√©guste un bon Bordeaux ‚Äî christian salmon (@SalmonCs) 7 novembre 2017

La fausse information a pourtant bien eu le temps de circuler. Elle est notamment parvenue jusqu'√† l'ancien premier ministre Manuel Valls, qui s'est empress√© de la d√©mentir, non sans indignation et col√®re. "N'importe quoi!!! Je viens de parler avec lui... et parler √† un mort n'est pas un privil√®ge d'ancien premier ministre", a tweet√© avec ironie le d√©put√© de l'Essonne en r√©ponse √† un tweet (depuis supprim√©) de la cha√Æne de t√©l√©vision isra√©lienne i24NEWS qui relayait l'annonce du d√©c√®s.

N'importe quoi !!!je viens de parler avec lui..et parler √† un mort n'est pas un privil√®ge d'ancien premier ministre https://t.co/GG40DRiKoe ‚Äî Manuel Valls (@manuelvalls) 7 novembre 2017

Dans un tweet post√© quelques minutes plus tard, "@GallimardNews" r√©v√®le qu'il s'agit d'un "faux compte cr√©√© par le journaliste italien Tommasso Debenedetti". Ce dernier diffuse r√©guli√®rement de fausses informations sur Twitter, via de faux comptes, dans le but de d√©noncer les "points faibles" des m√©dias et "montrer que Twitter est devenu une agence de presse... et la moins fiable au monde", rapporte la RTBF.

Fin ao√ªt, un faux compte Twitter avait annonc√©, √† tort, la mort de l'√©crivain japonais Haruki Murakami.

Pour ceux qui s'interrogent sur la mort √©ventuelle de Murakami, annonc√©e par @ShinchoshaBooks : c'est louche, et annonc√© nulle part ailleurs https://t.co/pVcQNiH6Zh ‚Äî Micha√´l Szadkowski (@szadkowski_m) 21 ao√ªt 2017

√Ä voir √©galement sur Le HuffPost:
TITLE: Milan Kundera annonc√© mort par un faux compte Twitter, Valls s'emporte: "N'importe quoi! Je viens de parler avec lui"

Sylvain Archambault, r√©alisateur de s√©ries √† succ√®s comme Les pays d'en haut et Mensonges et du film Pour toujours les Canadiens, est la plus r√©cente personnalit√© qu√©b√©coise √† √™tre vis√©e par des all√©gations d'inconduites professionnelles et sexuelles.
¬´J'ai vu le premier assistant de Sylvain Archambault lui remplir sa tasse √† caf√© en carton avec de l'alcool.
Archambault aurait aussi l'habitude de tourner des sc√®nes malaisantes qui ne font pas partie des sc√©narios qu'il doit porter √† l'√©cran.
Habitu√©e de collaborer avec le r√©alisateur, la productrice Fabienne Larouche a assur√© qu'elle ne travaillait plus avec lui.
Je n'ai pas le temps ni l'argent.
TEXT:
Sylvain Archambault, r√©alisateur de s√©ries √† succ√®s comme Les pays d'en haut et Mensonges et du film Pour toujours les Canadiens, est la plus r√©cente personnalit√© qu√©b√©coise √† √™tre vis√©e par des all√©gations d'inconduites professionnelles et sexuelles.

Dans un article publi√© ce mercredi 8 novembre, dans La Presse+, Katia Gagnon et St√©phanie Vallet, qui sont √† l'origine de l'affaire √âric Salvail, r√©v√®lent les confidences d'une vingtaine de com√©diens et techniciens ayant travaill√© avec le r√©alisateur.

Catalu√±a vive una nueva huelga general este mi√©rcoles convocada por sindicatos minoritarios y que no cuenta con el apoyo de CC.OO. de Catalu√±a y UGT de Catalu√±a, que se han desmarcado de esta huelga general y no la secundar√°n, aunque han convocado varias movilizaciones el mismo d√≠a contra "las pol√≠ticas autoritarias" del Gobierno central.

As√≠ se est√° viviendo este mi√©rcoles en Catalu√±a:

El Metro de Barcelona circula con una frecuencia equivalente al 85% de lo que es habitual en un d√≠a laborable, mientras que los autobuses de la ciudad transitan con normalidad, seg√∫n informa Transports Metropolitans de Barcelona (TMB).

Tambi√©n la C-37 en Castellfollit del Boix y Manresa (Barcelona), la C-59 en Moi√† (Barcelona), la N-145 en La Seu d'Urgell (Lleida), la N-230 en Vilaller (Lleida), la N-340 en Molins de Rei (Barcelona) y en Amposta (Tarragona), la N-II en Vilassar de Mar (Barcelona) y la N-IIa en Figueres (Girona).

Las mayores retenciones se han producido en la A-2 en Sant Joan Desp√≠ (Barcelona), con 15 kil√≥metros de congesti√≥n, y 11 en la B-23 en Sant Just Desvern (Barcelona).

Varios grupos de manifestantes han cortado las v√≠as de trenes de cercan√≠as de Barcelona y, pasadas las 8,30 horas, s√≥lo funcionan en su totalidad las l√≠neas R-2 y R-8.

TEXT:
Als meine Kinder zwei und vier Jahre alt waren und meine j√ºngere Tochter in die Kita kam, habe ich gemerkt, dass es mir nicht gut geht. Ich versp√ºrte diesen inneren Druck, dass alles immer perfekt laufen musste. Ich redete mir ein, dass ich, sobald die Kinder im Kindergarten sein w√ºrden, wieder voll in den Beruf einsteigen musste.

Ist es wirklich so seltsam, wenn eine Mutter drei Tage mit Freundinnen in ein Wellnesshotel f√§hrt? Oder einen Wochenendtrip nach Berlin macht? Ist es verwerflich, wenn ich mir als Mutter einmal eine Auszeit nehme?

Euch Eltern zu sagen: Die Zeit, in der eure Kinder so klein sind, wird nicht ewig verweilen. Sie wird sehr bald vorbei sein. Die Fl√ºgel werden rasch wachsen. Die kleinen V√∂gel werden ausfliegen. Irgendwann sind es nur noch Erinnerungen.

In der Schule sah ich, wie sie irritiert einen Jungen beobachtete, der kaum eine Banane sch√§len konnte. Sie hatte am Morgen vorher einen Granatapfel zerteilt, die Kerne aus den H√§lften geklopft und im Wasserbad die √úberreste der Fruchtkammern von den Kernen gel√∂st.

Fr√ºher hat mich mein Bruder immer mitten in der Nacht geweckt, um gemeinsam Ninjas zu jagen. Im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes. Diese Zeit war etwas Kostbares f√ºr mich, ich f√ºhlte mich geehrt, weil er mich an diesem Spiel teilnehmen lie√ü.

Du wirst dich nicht an die N√§chte erinnern, in denen ich dich in den Schlaf getragen habe, aber ich werde es. Du wirst dich nicht an die Momente erinnern, an denen ich meine Nerven verloren habe - und den Raum kurz verlassen musste, um Luft zu holen, aber ich werde es.
TITLE: Familie Eltern Kinder

TEXT:
Il n'est donc pas surprenant que les derni√®res √©tudes sur le d√©codage g√©nomique du chien aient d√©voil√© de curieuses ressemblances entre certains g√®nes humains et canins : du mat√©riel g√©n√©tique commun au niveau du syst√®me digestif et du syst√®me neuronal.

Toute cette histoire a commenc√© par un joli mensonge. On vous a s√ªrement racont√© quand vous √©tiez petit que vous √©tiez le fabuleux r√©sultat du m√©lange de vos parents. Du type ¬´ ton ADN c'est un peu plus de 50 % des g√®nes de maman (l'ovule) et un peu moins de 50 % des g√®nes de papa (le sperme) ¬ª. Faux ! C'est beaucoup plus compliqu√© que cela, car en plus de l'ADN de la famille, il y a beaucoup de mat√©riels g√©n√©tiques qui viennent d'ailleurs.

C'est une petite erreur de penser que notre corps et notre esprit nous appartiennent vraiment. En fait, vous √™tes une fusion de nombreux organismes humains et non-humains qui sont constamment en train de lutter pour prendre le contr√¥le. Une vraie guerre dont les effets sont perceptibles sur nous et dans nos comportements.

En effet, les microbes dans votre intestin peuvent produire des mol√©cules qui vont influencer votre app√©tit. Ils sont donc capables d'influer directement sur votre esprit. Ils font en sorte que vous ayez envie de leur nourriture pr√©f√©r√©e. Et c'est tr√®s souvent cinq portions de gras, sucre et sel par jour. D'ailleurs, la prochaine fois qu'une envie subite de chips vous arrive vers 22h, dites simplement √† vos parents : je n'y peux rien, mes bact√©ries ont pris le contr√¥le !

Notre connaissance de ce ¬´ superorganisme ¬ª humain en est encore √† ses balbutiements. Cependant, on sait depuis longtemps que nos corps sont vraiment une fusion de nombreux organismes diff√©rents. Les sciences de la microbiologie ont montr√© par une succession d'√©tudes que le corps humain √©tait un √©cosyst√®me fait de ¬´ microbiotes ¬ª, qui h√©bergent toutes sortes d'animaux : virus, bact√©ries, parasites, champignons, acariens, etc., sans lesquels nous ne pourrions tout simplement pas vivre. Il y a dans notre propre corps 10 fois plus de cellules qui ne contiennent pas notre ADN que de cellules qui le pr√©sentent. Ces micro-vies changent et s'√©changent du mat√©riel g√©n√©tique dans des interactions avec l'environnement qu'est notre corps. Des parties de g√®nes se baladent donc assez facilement dans l'organisme.

Les chercheurs ont aussi montr√© que l'ADN √©tait constitu√© de g√®nes qui ne sont pas humains.

Les chercheurs ont aussi montr√© que l'ADN √©tait constitu√© de g√®nes qui ne sont pas humains. √Ä titre d'exemple, pour le moment, les experts pensent que 1/10 du patrimoine g√©n√©tique global humain est compos√© d'ADN de virus. Ce ph√©nom√®ne est d√ª au fonctionnement m√™me des virus : ils entrent dans les cellules et manipulent le mat√©riel g√©n√©tique de leur h√¥te pour le reprogrammer, afin de cr√©er des clones. Clones qui vont √† leur tour pirater d'autres cellules, etc. Ainsi, l'ADN est la mati√®re premi√®re qui permet ce m√©lange qui se fait sur le long terme.

Et comme les virus poss√®dent plusieurs h√¥tes animaux (zoonoses), ce n'est pas que de l'ADN de virus qui finit dans notre syst√®me. Ainsi, les virus sont les principaux vecteurs de transmission d'ADN entre esp√®ces, surtout entre humains, cochons, vaches, chats et bien s√ªr chiens. C'est avec ce dernier animal qu'il y a le plus d'√©change, car il s'agit du premier √† avoir √©t√© domestiqu√©.

Il y aurait du chien en nous, au plus profond de notre √™tre.

Il n'est donc pas surprenant que les derni√®res √©tudes sur le d√©codage g√©nomique du chien aient d√©voil√© de curieuses ressemblances entre certains g√®nes humains et canins : du mat√©riel g√©n√©tique commun au niveau du syst√®me digestif et du syst√®me neuronal. Il y aurait du chien en nous, au plus profond de notre √™tre. C'est un nouveau coup dur pour l'anthropocentrisme : d'une certaine mani√®re, nous ne sommes pas si humains.
TITLE: Un ADN qui a du chien!

SUMMARY:
Governor General Julie Payette inspects the Honour Guard at the Legislature, while she takes part in her first visit to the province of New Brunswick, in Fredericton Nov. 7, 2017.
FREDERICTON ‚Äî Governor General Julie Payette, who faced criticism for a speech last week that some said mocked people of faith, praised Canada's tolerance and freedom of religion Tuesday.
Governor General Julie Payette inspects the Honour Guard at the Legislature, while she takes part in her first visit to the province of New Brunswick, Nov. 7, 2017.
Governor General Julie Payette, right, is welcomed by the Honourable Jocelyne Roy Vienneau, Lieutenant Governor of New Brunswick, centre, and New Brunswick Premier Brian Gallant while taking part in her first visit to the province Nov. 7, 2017.
Payette was sworn in as Canada's 29th Governor General on Oct. 2.
TEXT:
Governor General Julie Payette inspects the Honour Guard at the Legislature, while she takes part in her first visit to the province of New Brunswick, in Fredericton Nov. 7, 2017.

FREDERICTON ‚Äî Governor General Julie Payette, who faced criticism for a speech last week that some said mocked people of faith, praised Canada's tolerance and freedom of religion Tuesday.

She told the New Brunswick legislature that Canada is in a fortunate position to be able to make a difference, because the country is rich in values.

"Our values are tolerance and determination, and freedom of religion, freedom to act, opportunities, equality of opportunities amongst everyone and for all," she said.

The comments come a week after she criticized people who believe in creationism and horoscopes, and those who don't believe in climate change.

Payette's speech Tuesday followed the regular daily prayer used to open the New Brunswick legislature.

She did not directly address controversy over her earlier remarks, but the former astronaut spoke Tuesday about seeing Canada from space without borders, and talked of the need to work together.

"It is one planet and we all have a duty to protect it. We have to work together. We have to use our power to work together and make decisions and changes that are needed to preserve our world," she said.

In last Wednesday's speech at the Canadian Science Policy Convention in Ottawa, Payette urged her friends and former colleagues to take responsibility to shut down the misinformation about everything from health and medicine to climate change and even horoscopes that has flourished with the explosion of digital media.

Conservative strategist: speech was 'mean-spirited'

"Can you believe that still today in learned society, in houses of government, unfortunately, we're still debating and still questioning whether humans have a role in the Earth warming up or whether even the Earth is warming up, period?" she said.

"And we are still debating and still questioning whether life was a divine intervention or whether it was coming out of a natural process, let alone, oh my goodness, a random process."

She generated giggles and even some guffaws from the audience when she said too many people still believe "taking a sugar pill will cure cancer if you will it good enough and that your future and every single one of the people here's personalities can be determined by looking at planets coming in front of invented constellations."

I think that saying that some people's opinions weren't as important as others is not what has made Canada the nation it is today. Blaine Higgs, N.B. Progressive Conservative leader

Conservative political strategist Alise Mills said Payette went way over the line with her speech, which Mills characterized as not only political but "mean-spirited."

She said Payette wasn't just promoting science, she was mocking people with religious beliefs, and specifically, evangelical Christians who don't believe in evolutionary science.

But Prime Minister Justin Trudeau didn't seem to have any issue with what Payette said, saying his government and Canadians understand the value of science.

Governor General Julie Payette inspects the Honour Guard at the Legislature, while she takes part in her first visit to the province of New Brunswick, Nov. 7, 2017.

Blaine Higgs, New Brunswick's Progressive Conservative leader, said he thought Payette's comment's last week were "inappropriate."

"I think that saying that some people's opinions weren't as important as others is not what has made Canada the nation it is today," Higgs said, adding Payette was new to the job and he didn't think she'd make similar comments in the future.

Payette met Tuesday with Lt.-Gov. Jocelyne Roy Vienneau and Premier Brian Gallant before addressing the legislative assembly.

Payette's visit also included a tour of the Institute of Biomedical Engineering's prosthetics labs at the University of New Brunswick, and a visit to 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown.

Payette toured the base wearing a Canadian Forces combat uniform, the first time she has had the opportunity to don the uniform and visit a military base since becoming Governor General.

Governor General Julie Payette, right, is welcomed by the Honourable Jocelyne Roy Vienneau, Lieutenant Governor of New Brunswick, centre, and New Brunswick Premier Brian Gallant while taking part in her first visit to the province Nov. 7, 2017.

She rode in a LAV 6 armoured vehicle before taking a short flight in a Griffin helicopter.

"I must say I was so very impressed by the professionalism, by the dedication, but also by the sense of community that I felt throughout the visit. This is a gem," Payette said of her trip to the sprawling training base.

She made the comment at a reception hosted by Gallant at the Beaverbrook Art Gallery.

Payette was sworn in as Canada's 29th Governor General on Oct. 2.

Also On HuffPost:
TITLE: Governor General Julie Payette Praises Canada's Freedom Of Religion, Tolerance In N.B. Speech
